## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-115">Invalidar todas as entradas dinâmicas na cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-116">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-117">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-118">Este serviço invalida todas as entradas dinâmicas de ARP atualmente na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-119">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-120">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-121">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cache ARP bem sucedido invalida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-126">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-127">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-128">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-129">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-130">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-148">Definir entrada dinâmica ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-149">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-150">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-151">Este serviço atribui uma entrada dinâmica a partir da cache ARP e configura o IP especificado para o mapeamento de endereço físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-152">Se for especificado um endereço físico zero, é enviado um pedido real de ARP para a rede, a fim de ter o endereço físico resolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-153">Note também que esta entrada será removida se o envelhecimento ARP estiver ativo ou se a cache ARP estiver esgotada e esta é a entrada ARP menos usada recentemente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-154">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-155">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-156">**ip_address** Endereço IP para mapa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) do endereço físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-158">**physical_lsw** Inferior 32 bits (31-0) do endereço físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-159">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de entrada dinâmica ARP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não há mais entradas ARP disponíveis na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de instância IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-166">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-167">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-168">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-169">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-170">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-188">Ativar o Protocolo de Resolução de Endereços (ARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-189">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-190">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-191">Este serviço inicializa o componente ARP da NetX Duo para a instância IP específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-192">A inicialização do ARP inclui a configuração da cache ARP e várias rotinas de processamento ARP necessárias para o envio e receção de mensagens ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-193">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-194">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-195">**arp_cache_memory** Ponteiro para a área de memória para colocar cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-196">**arp_cache_size** Cada entrada ARP é de 52 bytes, o número total de entradas ARP é, portanto, o tamanho dividido por 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-197">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ativar ARP com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de memória cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) A memória de cache ARP fornecida pelo utilizador é demasiado pequena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Este componente já foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

```c
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-225">Excluir uma entrada ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-227">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-228">Este serviço remove uma entrada ARP para o endereço IP dado da sua tabela ARP interna IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-229">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-230">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-231">**ip_address** A entrada ARP com o endereço IP especificado deve ser eliminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-232">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ativar ARP com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Não é possível encontrar nenhuma entrada com o endereço IP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de memória cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O endereço IP especificado é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-238">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-239">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-240">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-242">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-260">Envie um pedido gratuito de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-261">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-262">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-263">Este serviço passa por todas as interfaces físicas para transmitir pedidos ARP gratuitos, desde que o endereço IP da interface seja válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-264">Se uma resposta ARP for posteriormente recebida, o manipulador de resposta fornecido é chamado para processar a resposta ao ARP gratuito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-265">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-266">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-267">**response_handler** Ponteiro para função de manuseamento de resposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-268">Se NX_NULL for fornecida, as respostas são ignoradas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-269">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Enviado gratuito gratuito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Nenhum pacote disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O endereço IP atual é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-276">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-277">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-278">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-279">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-280">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-298">Localizar endereço de hardware físico dado um endereço IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-299">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-300">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-301">Este serviço tenta encontrar um endereço de hardware físico na cache ARP que esteja associado ao endereço IP fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-302">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-303">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-304">**ip_address** Endereço IP para procurar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-305">**physical_msw** Ponteiro para a variável para devolver os 16 bits superiores (47-32) do endereço físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-306">**physical_lsw** Ponteiro para a variável para devolver os 32 bits inferiores (31-0) do endereço físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-307">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */

   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-336">Recuperar informações sobre atividades de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-337">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-338">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-339">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades ARP para a instância IP associada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-340">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-341">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-342">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-343">**arp_requests_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o total de pedidos de ARP enviados a partir desta instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-344">**arp_requests_received** Ponteiro para destino para o total de pedidos de ARP recebidos da rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-345">**arp_responses_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o total de respostas ARP enviadas a partir desta instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-346">**arp_responses_received** Ponteiro para o destino para o total de respostas ARP recebidas da rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Ponteiro para o destino para o número atual de entradas dinâmicas de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-348">**arp_static_entries** Ponteiro para o destino para o número atual de entradas estáticas de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-349">**arp_aged_entries** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de entradas ARP que envelheceram e se tornaram inválidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Ponteiro para o destino das mensagens ARP inválidas totais recebidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-351">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações ARP bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-356">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-357">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-358">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-360">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-378">Localizar endereço IP dado um endereço físico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-379">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-380">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-381">Este serviço tenta encontrar um endereço IP na cache ARP que esteja associado ao endereço físico fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-382">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-383">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-384">**ip_address** Ponteiro para devolver o endereço IP, se for encontrado um que tenha sido mapeado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) do endereço físico para procurar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-386">**physical_lsw** Menos 32 bits (31-0) do endereço físico para procurar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-387">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sucesso do endereço IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) O mapeamento não foi encontrado na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw e physical_lsw são 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-394">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-395">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-396">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-397">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-398">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-416">Eliminar todas as entradas estáticas de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-417">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-418">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-419">Este serviço elimina todas as entradas estáticas na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-420">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-421">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-422">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) As entradas estáticas são eliminadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro ip_ptr Inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-427">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-428">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-429">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-430">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-431">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-449">Criar IP estático para mapeamento de hardware em cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-450">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-451">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-452">Este serviço cria um mapeamento de endereço ip-físico estático na cache ARP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-453">As entradas ARP estáticas não estão sujeitas a atualizações periódicas ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-454">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-455">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-456">**ip_address** Endereço IP para mapa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) do endereço físico para mapear.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-458">**physical_lsw** Inferior 32 bits (31-0) do endereço físico para mapear.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-459">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada estática bem sucedida da ARP cria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não há mais entradas ARP disponíveis na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw e physical_lsw são 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-467">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-468">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-469">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-470">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-471">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-489">Elimine IP estático para mapeamento de hardware em cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-490">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-491">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-492">Este serviço encontra e elimina um mapeamento de endereço ip-físico previamente criado na cache ARP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-493">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-494">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-495">**ip_address** Endereço IP que foi mapeado estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) do endereço físico que foi mapeado estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-497">**physical_lsw** Inferior 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) do endereço físico que foi mapeado estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-498">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada estática bem sucedida da ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) A entrada estática ARP não foi encontrada na cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw e physical_lsw são 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-506">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-507">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-508">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-509">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-510">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-528">Ativar o Protocolo de Mensagens de Controlo de Internet (ICMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-529">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-530">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-531">Este serviço permite o componente ICMP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-532">O componente ICMP é responsável pelo tratamento de mensagens de erro da Internet e pedidos e respostas de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-533">\*Este serviço apenas permite o ICMP para o serviço IPv4. Para permitir tanto o ICMPv4 como o ICMPv6, as aplicações devem utilizar o serviço \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-534">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-535">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-536">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP já está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-541">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-542">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-543">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-544">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-545">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-554">Recuperar informações sobre atividades do ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-555">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-556">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-557">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades do ICMP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-558">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-559">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-560">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-561">**pings_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pings enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-562">**ping_timeouts** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de intervalos de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de fios suspensos em pedidos de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-564">**ping_responses_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de respostas de ping recebidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de erros de verificação ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de mensagens ICMP não manuseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-567">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informação bem sucedida do ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-572">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-573">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-574">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-575">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-576">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-578">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-578">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-579">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-579">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-585">Enviar pedido de ping para endereço IP especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-586">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-587">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-588">Este serviço envia um pedido de ping para o endereço IP especificado e aguarda o tempo especificado para uma mensagem de resposta a ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-589">Se não for recebida qualquer resposta, um erro é devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-590">Caso contrário, toda a mensagem de resposta é devolvida na variável apontada por response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-591">Para enviar um pedido de ping para um destino IPv6, as aplicações devem utilizar o serviço ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ ou _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-592">*Se NX_SUCCESS for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido depois de já não ser necessário*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-593">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-594">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-595">**ip_address** Endereço IP, em ordem de anfitrião byte, para ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-596">**dados** Ponteiro para a área de dados para mensagem de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-597">**data_size** Número de bytes nos dados do ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-598">**response_ptr** Ponteiro para o ponteiro do pacote para devolver a mensagem de resposta do ping dentro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-599">**wait_option** Define o número de carraças do temporizador ThreadX para aguardar uma resposta de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-600">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-601">Opção de Espera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-602">Valor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-604">(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-605">valor de tempo limite em carrapatos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-606">(0x00000001 através de 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-609">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ping de sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-611">O ponteiro da mensagem de resposta foi colocado na variável apontada por response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Incapaz de atribuir um pacote de pedido de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Área de dados especificada excede o tamanho do pacote padrão para esta instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) A IP solicitada não respondeu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de resposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-621">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-622">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-623">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-624">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-633">Ativar o Protocolo de Gestão do Grupo de Internet (IGMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-633">Enable Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-634">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-634">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-635">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-636">Este serviço permite o componente IGMP na instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-637">A componente IGMP é responsável por fornecer suporte para operações de gestão de grupos multicast IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-638">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-638">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-639">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-639">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-640">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IGMP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Este componente já foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-645">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-646">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-646">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-647">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-647">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-648">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-648">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-649">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-649">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP is enabled. */
```
