## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-663">Recuperar informações sobre atividades do IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-664">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-665">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-666">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades do IGMP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-667">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-668">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-669">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de relatórios do ICMP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-671">**igmp_queries_received** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de consultas recebidas pelo router multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de erros de verificação IGMP em pacotes de receção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-673">**current_groups_joined** Ponteiro para o destino do número atual de grupos unidos através desta instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-674">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações bem sucedidas do IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-679">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-680">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-681">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-682">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-683">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-697">Desativar o loopback IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-697">Disable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-698">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-698">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-699">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-700">Este serviço desativa o loopback IGMP para todos os grupos multicasts subsequentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-700">This service disables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-701">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-702">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-702">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-703">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-703">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desativação de loopback IGMP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio ou inicialização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-708">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-709">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-709">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-710">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-710">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-712">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-712">Example</span></span>

```c

   joined. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-726">Ativar o loopback IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-726">Enable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-727">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-727">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-728">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-729">Este serviço permite o loopback IGMP para todos os grupos multicasts subsequentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-729">This service enables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-730">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-731">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-731">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-732">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-732">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desativação de loopback IGMP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio ou inicialização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-737">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-738">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-738">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-739">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-740">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-740">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-741">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-741">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast
   groups joined. */
status = nx_igmp_loopback_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-754">Junte a instância IP a grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-755">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-756">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-757">Este serviço junta-se a uma instância IP ao grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-758">Mantém-se um contador interno para acompanhar o número de vezes que o mesmo grupo foi acompanhado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-759">Depois de se juntar ao grupo multicast, o componente IGMP permitirá a receção de pacotes IP com este endereço de grupo através da interface de rede especificada e também reportará aos routers que este IP é membro deste grupo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-760">A adesão ao IGMP junta-se, reporta e deixa as mensagens também são enviadas através da interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-761">Para aderir a um grupo multicast IPv4 sem enviar o relatório de adesão ao grupo IGMP, a aplicação utilizará o serviço ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-762">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-763">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-764">**group_address** Endereço de grupo multicast classe D IP para se juntar na ordem byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-765">**interface_index** Índice da Interface ligado à instância NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-766">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não podem ser acompanhados mais grupos multicast, o máximo excedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** endereço de grupo multicast fornecido (0x21) não é um endereço de classe D válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** suporte multicast IP (0x14) não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-774">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-775">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-776">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-777">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-778">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-789">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-789">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-791">Deixe o grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-791">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-792">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-793">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-794">Este serviço deixa o grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-795">Mantém-se um contador interno para acompanhar o número de vezes que o mesmo grupo tem sido membro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-796">Após deixar o grupo multicast, o componente IGMP enviará o relatório de adesão adequado, e poderá sair do grupo se não houver membros deste nó.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-797">Para deixar um grupo multicast IPv4 sem enviar o relatório de adesão ao grupo IGMP, o pedido deve utilizar o serviço ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-798">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-799">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-800">**group_address** Endereço de grupo multicast ip classe D para sair.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-801">O endereço IP está em ordem de acolhimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-802">**interface_index** Índice da Interface ligado à instância NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-803">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) O endereço de grupo multicast especificado não pode ser encontrado na tabela multicast local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** endereço de grupo multicast fornecido (0x21) não é um endereço de classe D válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** suporte multicast IP (0x14) não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-811">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-812">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-812">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-813">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-813">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-814">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-814">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-815">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-828">Junte-se à instância IP para grupo multicast especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-829">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-830">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-831">Este serviço junta-se a uma instância IP ao grupo multicast especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-832">Mantém-se um contador interno para acompanhar o número de vezes que o mesmo grupo foi acompanhado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-833">O condutor é ordenado a enviar um relatório IGMP se este for o primeiro pedido de junção na rede indicando a intenção do anfitrião de se juntar ao grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-834">Após a adesão, o componente IGMP permitirá a receção de pacotes IP com este endereço de grupo e informará aos routers que este IP é membro deste grupo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-835">Para aderir a um grupo multicast IPv4 sem enviar o relatório de adesão ao grupo IGMP, a aplicação utilizará o serviço ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-836">*Para se juntar a um grupo multicast num dispositivo não primário, utilize o **serviço nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-837">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-838">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-839">**group_address** Endereço de grupo multicast classe D IP para aderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-840">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não podem ser acompanhados mais grupos multicast, o máximo excedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço de grupo IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-848">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-849">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-849">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-850">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-852">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_join(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-866">Fazer com que a instância IP deixe o grupo multicast especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-866">Cause IP instance to leave specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-867">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-867">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-868">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-869">Este serviço faz com que uma instância IP saia do grupo multicast especificado, se o número de equestres de licença corresponder ao número de pedidos de aderi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-870">Caso contrário, a contagem interna de juntas é simplesmente decrementeda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-871">Para deixar um grupo multicast IPv4 sem enviar o relatório de adesão ao grupo IGMP, o pedido deve utilizar o serviço ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-872">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-873">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-874">**group_address** Grupo multicast para sair.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-875">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Não foi encontrado o pedido de aderião anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço de grupo IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-883">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-883">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-884">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-885">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-885">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-886">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-887">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-901">Notifique a aplicação se o endereço IP mudar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-902">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-903">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-904">Este serviço regista uma função de notificação de aplicação que é chamada sempre que o endereço IPv4 é alterado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-905">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-906">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-907">**change_notify** Ponteiro para função de notificação de alteração IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-908">Se este parâmetro for NX_NULL, a notificação de alteração de endereço IP é desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-909">**additional_info** Ponteiro para informações adicionais opcionais que também são fornecidas à função de notificação quando o endereço IP é alterado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-910">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Notificação de alteração de endereço IP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-944">Recuperar endereço IPv4 e máscara de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-945">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-946">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-947">Este serviço recupera o endereço IPv4 e a sua máscara de sub-rede da interface de rede primária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-948">\*Para obter informações sobre o dispositivo secundário, utilize o serviço \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-949">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-950">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-951">**ip_address** Ponteiro para destino para endereço IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-952">**network_mask** Ponteiro para destino para máscara de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-953">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) endereço IP bem sucedido obtém.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro variável de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-957">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-958">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-959">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-960">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-961">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-987">Definir endereço IPv4 e máscara de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-988">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-989">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-990">Este serviço define o endereço IPv4 e a máscara de rede para a interface de rede primária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-991">\*Para definir o endereço IP e a máscara de rede para o dispositivo secundário, utilize o serviço \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-992">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-992">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-993">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-993">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-994">**ip_address** Novo endereço IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-995">**network_mask** Nova máscara de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-995">**network_mask** New network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-996">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) conjunto de endereços IP bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1001">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1002">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1002">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1003">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1003">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1004">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1004">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1005">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1031">Configure uma piscina de pacotes auxiliares</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1032">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1033">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1034">Este serviço configura uma piscina de pacotes auxiliares na instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1035">Para um sistema limitado à memória, o utilizador pode aumentar a eficiência da memória criando o conjunto de pacotes predefinidos com o tamanho do pacote de MTU, e criando uma piscina de pacotes auxiliares com tamanho de pacote menor para o fio IP para transmitir pequenos pacotes com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1036">O tamanho recomendado do pacote para a piscina auxiliar é de 256 bytes, assumindo que o IPv6 e o IPsec estão ambos ativados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1037">Por predefinição, a instância IP não aceita o conjunto de pacotes auxiliares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1038">Para ativar esta funcionalidade, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* devem ser definidas ao compilar a biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1039">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1040">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1041">**aux_pool** A piscina de pacotes auxiliares a configurar para a instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1042">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) conjunto de endereços IP bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) A função de piscina de pacotes duplos não é compilada na biblioteca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido ou ponteiro de piscina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1047">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1048">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1049">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1050">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1051">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1066">Criar uma instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1067">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1068">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1069">Este serviço cria uma instância IP com o endereço IP fornecido pelo utilizador e o controlador de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1070">Além disso, a aplicação deve fornecer um conjunto de pacotes previamente criado para a instância IP para usar para a atribuição interna de pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1071">Note que o controlador de rede de aplicações fornecido não é chamado até que o fio deste IP seja executado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1072">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1073">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para bloquear para criar uma nova instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1074">**nome** Nome deste novo exemplo de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1075">**ip_address** Endereço IP para este novo exemplo de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1076">**network_mask** Máscara para delinear a parte da rede do endereço IP para utilizações de sub-redes e super-redes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1077">**default_pool** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da piscina de pacotes NetX Duo anteriormente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1078">**ip_network_driver** Controlador de rede fornecido pelo utilizador utilizado para enviar e receber pacotes IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1079">**memory_ptr** Ponteiro para a área de memória para a área de pilha do ajudante IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1080">**memory_size** Número de bytes na área de memória para a pilha do fio do ajudante IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1081">**prioridade** Prioridade do fio do ajudante ip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1082">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criação de instância IP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) a biblioteca NetX Duo está configurada incorretamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido, ponteiro de função do controlador de rede, piscina de pacotes ou ponteiro de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) O tamanho da pilha fornecida é demasiado pequeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O endereço IP fornecido é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) A prioridade fornecida do fio IP é inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1090">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1091">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1092">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1092">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1093">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1093">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1094">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1120">Eliminar instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1121">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1122">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1123">Este serviço elimina uma instância IP previamente criada e liberta todos os recursos do sistema detidos pela instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1124">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1125">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1126">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminação IP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) Este caso IP ainda tem tomadas UDP ou TCP ligadas a ele.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1129">Todas as tomadas devem ser desvinculados e eliminadas antes de eliminar a instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1132">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1132">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1133">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1133">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1134">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1134">Preemption Possible</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created IP instance. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1162">Emitir comando ao controlador de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1163">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1164">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1165">Este serviço fornece uma interface direta ao controlador de interface de rede primária da aplicação especificado durante a ***chamada nx_ip_create.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1166">Os comandos específicos da aplicação podem ser utilizados desde que o seu valor numérico seja superior ou igual a NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1167">\*Para emitir comando para o dispositivo secundário, utilize o serviço \*\*nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1168">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1169">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1170">**comando** Código de comando numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1171">Os comandos padrão são definidos da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1180">**return_value_ptr** Ponteiro para devolver variável no chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1181">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Comando direto do controlador de rede bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Comando do controlador de rede não manuseado ou não simplificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de valor de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de interface inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1187">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1188">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1189">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1190">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1191">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1217">Emitir comando ao controlador de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1218">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1219">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1220">Este serviço fornece um comando direto ao controlador de dispositivo de rede da aplicação na instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1221">Os comandos específicos da aplicação podem ser utilizados desde que o seu valor numérico seja superior ou igual a *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1222">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1223">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1224">**comando** Código de comando numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1225">Os comandos padrão são definidos da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1246">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1273">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1273">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1274">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1274">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1275">Este serviço desativa o encaminhamento de pacotes IP dentro do componente IP NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1275">This service disables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1276">Na criação da tarefa IP, este serviço é automaticamente desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1276">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1314">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1314">Prototype</span></span>  

```c

```

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1316">Este serviço permite reencaminhar pacotes IP dentro do componente NetX Duo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1316">This service enables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1317">Na criação da tarefa IP, este serviço é automaticamente desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1317">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ativação de encaminhamento IP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1324">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1325">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1325">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>
