## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1354">Desativar a fragmentação do pacote IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1354">Disable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1355">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1355">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1356">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1357">Este serviço desativa a fragmentação e a funcionalidade de fragmentação e remontagem do pacote IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1358">Para pacotes à espera de serem remontados, este serviço liberta estes pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1359">Na criação da tarefa IP, este serviço é automaticamente desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1360">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1361">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1362">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desativação de fragmentos IP bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) A fragmentação ip não está ativada na instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation is not enabled on the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1367">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1368">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1368">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1369">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1369">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1370">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1370">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1371">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1371">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, disables IP fragmenting on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1397">Ativar a fragmentação do pacote IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1397">Enable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1398">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1398">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1399">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1400">Este serviço permite a fragmentação e montagem de pacotes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1401">Na criação da tarefa IP, este serviço é automaticamente desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1402">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1403">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1403">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1404">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1404">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ativar o fragmento IP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) As características de fragmentação IP não são compiladas no NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation features is not compiled into NetX Duo.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1409">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1409">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1410">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1410">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1411">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1411">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1412">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1412">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1413">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1413">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP fragmenting has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1439">Limpe o endereço de gateway IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1440">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1441">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1442">Este serviço limpa o endereço de gateway IPv4 configurado no caso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1443">Para limpar um IPv6 por defeito fora da instância IP, as aplicações devem utilizar o serviço ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1444">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1444">Parameters</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1461">Este serviço recupera o endereço de gateway IPv4 configurado na instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Endereço gateway não encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1487">Definir endereço IP gateway</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1489">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1490">Este serviço define o endereço IP do gateway IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1491">Todo o tráfego fora da rede é encaminhado para este portal de transmissão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1492">O gateway deve estar diretamente acessível através de uma das interfaces de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1493">Para configurar o endereço de gateway IPv6, utilize o nxd_ipv6_default_router_add de ***serviço.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1494">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1495">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1496">**ip_address** Endereço IP do portal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1497">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) conjunto de endereço IP de Gateway bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de instância IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1503">Inicialização, fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1504">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1505">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1506">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1521">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1522">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades IP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1523">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1524">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de bytes enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de IP recebem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de bytes IP recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes IP inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de receção reduzido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de envio reduzidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de fragmentos enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1536">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações IP bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1544">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1570">Recuperar endereço IP de interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1571">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1572">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1573">Este serviço recupera o endereço IPv4 de uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1574">Para recuperar o endereço IPv6, a aplicação deve utilizar o serviço ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1575">*O dispositivo especificado, se não o dispositivo primário, deve ser previamente ligado à instância IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1576">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1577">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1578">**interface_index** Índice de interface, o mesmo valor que o índice da interface de rede anexada à instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1579">**ip_address** Ponteiro para destino para o endereço IP interface do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1580">**network_mask** Ponteiro para destino para a máscara de rede de interface do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1581">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) endereço IP bem sucedido obtém.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) A interface de rede especificada é inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1586">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1587">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1588">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1589">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1590">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1605">Configure se o mapeamento de endereços é necessário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1606">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1607">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1608">Este serviço configura se o endereço IP para mapeamento de endereço MAC é necessário para a interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1609">Este serviço é normalmente chamado do controlador do dispositivo de interface para notificar a pilha IP se a interface subjacente requer endereço IP para o mapeamento de endereços de camada dois (MAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1610">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1611">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1612">**interface_index** Índice para a interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE - mapeamento de endereço necessário NX_FALSE - mapeamento de endereço não necessário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1614">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Configuração bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1619">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1620">Fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1621">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1622">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1623">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1638">Definir interface endereço IP e máscara de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1639">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1640">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1641">Este serviço define o endereço IPv4 e a máscara de rede para a interface IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1642">Para configurar o endereço de interface IPv6, a aplicação deve utilizar o serviço ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1643">*A interface especificada deve ser previamente anexada à instância IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1648">**network_mask** Nova máscara de rede de interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1659">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1674">Anexar interface de rede à instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1675">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1676">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1677">Este serviço adiciona uma interface de rede física à interface IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1678">Note que a instância IP é criada com a interface primária para que cada interface adicional seja secundária à interface primária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1679">O número total de interfaces de rede anexas à instância IP (incluindo a interface primária) não pode exceder **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1680">Se o fio IP ainda não estiver em funcionamento, as interfaces secundárias serão inicializadas como parte do processo de arranque do fio IP que inicializa todas as interfaces físicas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1681">Se a linha IP ainda não estiver em funcionamento, a interface secundária é inicializada como parte do serviço ***nx_ip_interface_attach.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1682">*ip_ptr deve apontar para uma estrutura IP NetX Duo válida. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** devem ser configurados para o número de interfaces de rede para a instância IP. O valor predefinido é um*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1683">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1684">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1685">**interface_name** Ponteiro para interface linha nome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1686">**ip_address** Endereço IP do dispositivo na ordem byte anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1687">**network_mask** Máscara de rede do dispositivo na ordem byte hospedeiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1688">**ip_link_driver** Controlador Ethernet para a interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1689">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A entrada é adicionada à mesa de encaminhamento estática.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Número máximo de interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES é excedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1693">Se o IPv6 estiver ativado, este erro também pode indicar que o controlador pode não ter recursos suficientes para lidar com as operações multicast IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) O endereço IP fornecido já é utilizado neste caso IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Entrada inválida do ponteiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Entrada de endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1698">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1699">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1700">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1701">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1702">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1717">Obtenha a capacidade de hardware de interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1718">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1719">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1720">Este serviço recupera a bandeira de capacidade da interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1721">Para utilizar este serviço, a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1722">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1723">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1724">**interface_index** Índice da interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Ponteiro para o espaço de memória para a bandeira de capacidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1726">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) obteve com sucesso informações sobre a capacidade da interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** funcionalidade de capacidade de interface (0x4B) não é suportada nesta construção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido ou ponteiro de bandeira de capacidade inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1732">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1733">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1734">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1736">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1751">Desa parte da bandeira de capacidade de hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1752">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1753">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1754">Este serviço é utilizado pelo controlador do dispositivo de rede para configurar a bandeira de capacidade para uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1755">Para utilizar este serviço, a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser compilada com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1756">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1757">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1758">**interface_index** Índice de interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Bandeira de capacidade para saída</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1760">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a bandeira de capacidade de hardware da interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** funcionalidade de capacidade de interface (0x4B) não é suportada nesta construção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1766">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1767">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1768">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1769">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1770">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1785">Retirar a interface especificada da instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1786">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1787">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1788">Este serviço destaca a interface IP especificada da instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1789">Uma vez que uma interface é separada, todas as tomadas TCP conectadas fechadas, e cache ND e entradas ARP para esta interface são removidas das respetivas tabelas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1790">As adesões IGMP para esta interface são removidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1791">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1792">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1793">**índice** Índice da interface a ser removido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1794">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) removeu com sucesso uma interface física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) A interface de rede especificada é inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiros inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1798">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1799">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1800">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1801">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1802">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1817">Recuperar parâmetros de interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1818">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1819">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1820">Este serviço obtém informações sobre os parâmetros de rede para a interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1821">Todos os dados são recuperados por encomenda de byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1822">*ip_ptr deve apontar para uma estrutura IP NetX Duo válida. A interface especificada, se não a interface primária, deve ser previamente anexada à instância IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1823">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1824">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1825">**interface_index** Índice especificando interface de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1826">**interface_name** Ponteiro para o tampão que detém o nome da interface de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1827">**ip_address** Ponteiro para o destino para o endereço IP da interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1828">**network_mask** Ponteiro para destino para máscara de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1829">**mtu_size** Ponteiro para destino para unidade de transferência máxima para esta interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1830">**physical_address_msw** Ponteiro para o destino para os 16 melhores bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Ponteiro para destino para menos 32 bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1832">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** informações de interface (0x00) foram obtidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Entrada inválida do ponteiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1837">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1838">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1839">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1840">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1841">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1856">Definir o valor MTU de uma interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1858">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1859">Este serviço é utilizado pelo controlador do dispositivo para configurar o valor IP MTU para a interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1860">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1861">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1862">**interface_index** Índice para a interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1863">**mtu_size** Tamanho IP MTU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1864">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o valor mtu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1869">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1869">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1870">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1870">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1871">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1872">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1872">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1873">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1888">Obtenha o endereço físico de um dispositivo de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1889">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1890">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1891">Este serviço recupera o endereço físico de uma interface de rede a partir da instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1892">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1893">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1894">**interface_index** Índice da interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1895">**physical_msw** Ponteiro para destino para os 16 melhores bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1896">**physical_lsw** Ponteiro para destino para menos 32 bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1897">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Com sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido ou ponteiro de endereço físico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1902">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1903">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1904">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1905">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1906">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1921">Definir o endereço físico para uma interface de rede especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1923">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1924">Este serviço é utilizado pela aplicação ou pelo controlador do dispositivo para configurar o endereço físico do endereço MAC da interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1925">O novo endereço MAC é aplicado no bloco de controlo da estrutura da interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1926">Se a bandeira ***update_driver*** estiver definida, é emitido um comando ao nível do condutor para que o controlador do dispositivo possa atualizar o seu endereço MAC programado no controlador Ethernet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1927">Numa situação típica, este serviço é chamado do controlador do dispositivo de interface durante a fase de inicialização para notificar a pilha IP do seu endereço MAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1928">Neste caso, a bandeira ***update_driver*** não deve ser colocada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1929">Esta rotina também pode ser chamada da aplicação do utilizador para reconfigurar o endereço MAC da interface no tempo de execução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1930">Neste caso de utilização, deve ser definida a bandeira ***update_driver,*** para que o novo endereço MAC possa ser aplicado ao controlador do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1931">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1932">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1933">**interface_index** Índice para a interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1934">**physical_msw** Ponteiro para destino para os 16 melhores bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1935">**physical_lsw** Ponteiro para destino para menos 32 bits do endereço MAC do dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1936">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1938">**Comando NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) não reconhecido pelo motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1942">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1946">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```
