## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1961">Verificar o estado de verificação de uma instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1962">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1963">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1964">Este serviço verifica e aguarda opcionalmente o estado especificado da interface de rede de uma instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1965">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1966">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1967">**interface_index** Número do índice de interface needed_status estado IP solicitado, definido no formulário bit-mape da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1977">**atual_status** Ponteiro para o destino de bits reais definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1978">wait_option Define como o serviço se comporta se as bits de estado solicitados não estiverem disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1979">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1981">**valor de tempo limite** (0x00000001 através de 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1981">**timeout value** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1983">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1983">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Verificação de estado IP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** pedido de estado (0x43) não foi satisfeito dentro do prazo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** ponteiro IP (0x07) é ou tornou-se inválido, ou o ponteiro de estado real é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) A opção de estado necessária inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1989">**Interface_index NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) está fora de alcance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1990">ou a interface não é válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1991">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1992">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1993">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1993">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1994">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1994">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-1995">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2010">Desa um conjunto de alterações de estado de ligação notifique a função de retorno de chamadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2011">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2012">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2013">Este serviço configura a alteração do estado de ligação notifica a função de retorno de chamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2014">A rotina *de link_status_change_notify* fornecida pelo utilizador é invocada quando o estado da interface primária ou secundária é alterado (por exemplo, o endereço IP é alterado.) Se *link_status_change_notify* é NU, a alteração do estado de ligação notifica a função de chamada de chamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2015">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2016">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2017">**link_status_change_notify** Função de retorno fornecida pelo utilizador a ser chamada a uma alteração da interface física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2018">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido ou novo ponteiro de endereço físico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2022">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2022">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2023">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2023">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2024">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2024">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2025">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2026">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2026">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure a callback function to be used when the physical
   interface status is changed. */
status = nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(&ip_0,
                                             my_change_cb);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the link status change notify function
   is set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2041">Calcular a carga máxima de dados do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2042">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2043">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2044">Este serviço encontra o tamanho máximo da carga útil da aplicação que não exigirá a fragmentação ip para chegar ao destino; por exemplo, a carga útil está no tamanho mtu da interface local ou abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2045">(ou o valor do Caminho MTU obtido através da descoberta do IPv6 Path MTU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2046">O cabeçalho IP e o tamanho superior do cabeçalho de aplicação (TCP ou UDP) são subtraídos da carga total.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2047">Se a Política de Segurança NetX Duo IPsec se aplicar a este ponto final, os cabeçalhos IPsec (ESP/AH) e as despesas gerais associadas, como o Vetor Inicial, também são subtraídos do MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2048">Este serviço é aplicável tanto para os pacotes IPv4 como IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2049">O parâmetro *if_index* especifica a interface a utilizar para o envio do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2050">Para um sistema multihome, o chamador precisa de especificar o parâmetro *if_index* se o destino for uma transmissão (apenas IPv4), multicast ou endereço iPv6 link-local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2051">Este serviço devolve dois valores ao chamador:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2052">start_offset_ptr: Esta é a localização após os cabeçalhos TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2053">payload_length_ptr: a quantidade de pedido de dados pode ser transferida sem exceder a MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2054">Não existe um serviço NetX equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2055">Restrições</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2056">A instância IP deve ser previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2057">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2058">**ip_ptr** Indicação para a instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2059">**dest_address** Ponteiro para endereço de destino do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2060">**if_index** Indica o índice da interface a utilizar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2061">**src_port** Número da porta de origem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2062">**dest_port** Número da porta de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2063">**protocolo** Protocolo de camada superior a utilizar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Ponteiro para o início dos dados para a carga máxima do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Ponteiro para o tamanho da carga útil, excluindo cabeçalhos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2066">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload com sucesso calculado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload successfully computed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface é inválido ou a interface não é válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido ou endereço de destino inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço inválido fornecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid address supplied</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Protocolo inválido (não UDP ou TCP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) O serviço não é chamado a partir da inicialização do sistema ou do contexto do fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2074">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2075">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2075">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2076">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2076">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2077">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2077">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2078">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2104">Desativar o envio/receção de pacotes brutos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2106">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2107">Este serviço desativa a transmissão e receção de pacotes IP crus para este caso IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2108">Se o serviço de pacotes brutos foi previamente ativado, e existem pacotes crus na fila de receção, este serviço libertará quaisquer pacotes crus recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2109">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2110">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2111">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacotes IP crus bem sucedidos desativar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2115">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2116">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2117">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2118">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2119">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2130">Permitir o processamento de pacotes crus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2131">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2132">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2133">Este serviço permite a transmissão e receção de pacotes IP crus para este caso IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2134">Os pacotes de TCP, UDP, ICMP e IGMP ainda são processados pela NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2135">Pacotes com tipos de protocolo de camada superior desconhecida são processados pela rotina de receção de pacotes crus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2136">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2137">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2138">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacotes ip crus bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2142">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2143">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2144">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2145">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2146">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2157">Definir filtro de pacote IP cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2158">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2159">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2160">Este serviço configura o filtro de pacotes crus IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2161">A função de filtro de pacotes brutos, implementada pela aplicação do utilizador, permite que uma aplicação receba pacotes crus com base em critérios fornecidos pelo utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2162">Note que a camada de invólucro BSD NetX Duo utiliza a função de filtro de pacote cru para manusear a tomada crua na camada BSD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2163">Para utilizar este serviço, a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2164">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2165">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Ponteiro de função do filtro de pacote cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2167">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a rotina do filtro de pacote cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Suporte ao pacote bruto não está disponível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2172">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2173">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2174">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2175">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2176">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2187">Receba pacote IP cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2188">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2189">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2190">Este serviço recebe um pacote IP cru a partir da instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2191">Se houver pacotes IP na fila de receção de pacotes brutos, o primeiro pacote (mais antigo) é devolvido ao chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2192">Caso contrário, se não houver pacotes disponíveis, o chamador pode suspender conforme especificado pela opção de espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2193">*Se NX_SUCCESS, for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido quando já não for necessário*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2194">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2195">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2196">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o ponteiro para colocar o pacote IP bruto recebido dentro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2197">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se os pacotes não estiverem disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2198">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2201">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2202">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacote IP cru bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Não estava disponível nenhum pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro do pacote de devolução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2209">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2210">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2211">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2212">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2213">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2215">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2215">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2224">Enviar pacote IP cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2226">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2227">Este serviço envia um pacote IPv4 cru para o endereço IP destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2228">Note que esta rotina retorna imediatamente, pelo que não se sabe se o pacote IP foi efetivamente enviado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2229">O controlador de rede será responsável pela libertação do pacote quando a transmissão estiver completa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2230">Para um sistema multihome, o NetX Duo utiliza o endereço IP de destino para encontrar uma interface de rede apropriada e utiliza o endereço IP da interface como endereço de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2231">Se o endereço IP de destino for transmitido ou multicast, a primeira interface válida é utilizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2232">As aplicações utilizam o ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** neste caso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2233">Para enviar um pacote IPv6 cru, a aplicação deve utilizar o serviço ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ ou _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2234">*A menos que um erro seja devolvido, o pedido não deve libertar o pacote após esta chamada. Ao fazê-lo, o controlador da rede libertará o pacote após a transmissão*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2235">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2236">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2237">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o pacote IP cru para enviar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2238">**destination_ip** Endereço IP de destino, que pode ser um endereço IP de anfitrião específico, uma transmissão de rede, um loop-back interno ou um endereço multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2239">**type_of_service** Define o tipo de serviço para a transmissão, os valores legais são os seguintes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2245">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacotes crus IP bem sucedidos enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) A função IP raw não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Tipo de serviço inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para preparar um cabeçalho IP no pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2258">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2270">Enviar pacote IP cru através de interface de rede especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2271">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2272">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2273">Este serviço envia um pacote IP bruto para o endereço IP de destino usando o endereço IPv4 local especificado como endereço de origem, e através da interface de rede associada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2274">Note que esta rotina retorna imediatamente, e não é, portanto, conhecido se o pacote IP foi realmente enviado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2275">O controlador de rede será responsável pela libertação do pacote quando a transmissão estiver completa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2276">Este serviço difere de outros serviços na medida em que não há forma de saber se o pacote foi realmente enviado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2277">Pode perder-se na Internet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2278">*Note que o processamento de IP bruto deve ser ativado*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2279">*Este serviço é semelhante ao **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** exceto que este serviço permite que uma aplicação envie pacotes IPv4 crus a partir de interfaces físicas especificadas.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2280">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2281">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para tarefa IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2282">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote para transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2283">**destination_ip** Endereço IP para enviar pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2284">**address_index** Índice do endereço da interface para enviar o pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2285">**type_of_service** Tipo de serviço para pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2286">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacote transmitido com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Não existe uma interface de saída adequada disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) processamento de pacotes IP crus não ativados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Entrada inválida do ponteiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Tipo de serviço inválido especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ponteiro de pré-final de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Ponteiro de pré-final de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de interface inválido especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2296">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2297">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2298">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2299">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2300">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2311">Definir o tamanho máximo de fila de receção bruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2312">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2313">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2314">Este serviço configura a profundidade máxima da fila de receção de pacotes ip crus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2315">Note que a fila de receção de pacotes ip cru é partilhada com pacotes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2316">Quando a fila de receção do pacote bruto atinge a profundidade máxima configurada pelo utilizador, os pacotes crus recentemente recebidos são largados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2317">O pacote ip bruto predefinido receber profundidade de fila é de 20.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2318">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2319">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2320">**queue_max** Novo valor para o tamanho da fila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2321">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definidos com sucesso em bruto receber a profundidade máxima da fila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2325">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2326">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2327">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2328">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2329">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2340">Adicione rota estática à mesa de encaminhamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2342">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2343">Este serviço adiciona uma entrada na tabela de encaminhamento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2344">Note que o endereço *next_hop* deve estar diretamente acessível a partir de um dos dispositivos de rede locais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2345">*Note que ip_ptr deve apontar para uma estrutura cómoda netx Duo IP válida e a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser construída com NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definida para usar este serviço. Por padrão, o NetX Duo é construído sem NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2346">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2347">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2348">**network_address** Endereço de rede alvo, em ordem byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2349">**net_mask** Máscara de rede de alvo, em ordem byte hospedeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2350">**next_hop** Próximo endereço de lúpulo para a rede alvo, em ordem byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2351">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A entrada é adicionada à mesa de encaminhamento estática.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) A mesa de encaminhamento está cheia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Esta função não está compilada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O próximo lúpulo não é diretamente acessível através de interfaces locais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro ip_ptr Inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2358">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2359">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2360">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2361">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2362">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2370">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2370">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2375">Eliminar rota estática da mesa de encaminhamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2377">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2378">Este serviço elimina uma entrada da tabela de encaminhamento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2379">*Note que ip_ptr deve apontar para uma estrutura cómoda netx Duo IP válida e a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser construída com NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definida para usar este serviço. Por padrão, o NetX Duo é construído sem NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2380">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2381">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2382">**network_address** Endereço de rede de destino, em ordem byte anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2383">**net_mask** Máscara de rede de alvo, em ordem byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2384">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Supressão bem sucedida da tabela de encaminhamento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) A entrada não pode ser encontrada na mesa de encaminhamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Esta função não está compilada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro ip_ptr Inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2390">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2391">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2392">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2393">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2394">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```
