## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2407">Verificar o estado de verificação de uma instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2408">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2409">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2410">Este serviço verifica e aguarda opcionalmente o estado especificado da interface de rede primária de uma instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2411">Para obter o estatuto nas interfaces secundárias, as aplicações utilizarão o ***serviço nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2412">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2413">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2414">**needed_status** Estado ip solicitado, definido no formulário bit-mape da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2424">**atual_status** Ponteiro para o destino de bits reais definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2425">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se as bits de estado solicitados não estiverem disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2426">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2428">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2430">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Verificação de estado IP bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** pedido de estado (0x43) não foi satisfeito dentro do prazo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** ponteiro IP (0x07) é ou tornou-se inválido, ou o ponteiro de estado real é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) A opção de estado necessária inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2440">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2466">Junte a instância IP a grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2467">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2468">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2469">Este serviço junta-se a uma instância IP ao grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2470">Uma vez que a instância IP se junta a um grupo multicast, a lógica de receção IP começa a encaminhar pacotes de dados do grupo dar grupo multicast para a camada superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2471">Note que este serviço se junta a um grupo multicast sem enviar relatórios IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2472">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2473">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2474">**group_address** Endereço de grupo multicast classe D IP para se juntar na ordem byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2475">**interface_index** Índice da Interface ligado à instância NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2476">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não podem ser acompanhados mais grupos multicast, o máximo excedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido para a instância IP, ou a instância IP é inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP não está habilitado neste caso de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** endereço de grupo multicast fornecido (0x21) não é um endereço de classe D válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2484">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2485">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2486">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2487">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2488">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2501">Deixe o grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2502">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2503">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2504">Este serviço deixa o grupo multicast especificado através de uma interface de rede especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2505">Depois de sair do grupo, este serviço não desencadeia a geração de mensagens IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2506">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2507">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2508">**group_address** Endereço de grupo multicast ip classe D para sair.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2509">O endereço IP está em ordem de acolhimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2510">**interface_index** Índice da Interface ligado à instância NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2511">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Grupo multicast bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) O endereço de grupo multicast especificado não pode ser encontrado na tabela multicast local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo aponta para uma interface de rede inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** endereço de grupo multicast fornecido (0x21) não é um endereço de classe D válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido para a instância IP, ou a instância IP é inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2518">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2519">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2520">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2522">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2536">Alocar pacote a partir de piscina especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2538">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2539">Este serviço atribui um pacote da piscina especificada e ajusta o ponteiro pré-final no pacote de acordo com o tipo de pacote especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2540">Se não houver pacote disponível, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2541">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2542">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para piscina de pacotes previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2543">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o ponteiro do ponteiro do pacote atribuído.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2544">**packet_type** Define o tipo de pacote solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2545">Consulte "Packet Pools" na página 63 do Capítulo 3 para obter uma lista de tipos de pacotes suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2546">**wait_option** Define o tempo de espera em carrapatos se não houver pacotes disponíveis na piscina de pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2547">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2550">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2551">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Atribuição de pacotes bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Nenhum pacote disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) O tamanho do pacote não pode suportar o protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Tipo de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de retorno de piscina ou pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Opção de espera inválida de não-leitura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2559">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2560">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs (controladores de rede de aplicações).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2561">A opção de espera deve ser *NX_NO_WAIT* quando utilizada no contexto ISR ou no temporizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2562">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2563">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2564">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2579">Pacote de cópia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2580">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2581">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2582">Este serviço copia as informações no pacote fornecido a um ou mais novos pacotes que são atribuídos a partir da piscina de pacotes fornecidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2583">Se for bem sucedido, o ponteiro para o novo pacote é devolvido no destino apontado por **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2584">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2585">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o pacote de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o destino de onde devolver o ponteiro à nova cópia do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2587">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para o pacote de pacotes anteriormente criado que é usado para alocar um ou mais pacotes para a cópia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2588">**wait_option** Define como o serviço espera se não houver pacotes disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2589">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2592">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2593">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cópia de pacote bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Pacote não disponível para cópia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) O pacote de origem ou cópia vazio falhou.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) O tamanho do pacote não pode suportar o protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Piscina inválida, pacote ou ponteiro de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Ponteiro de pré-final de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ponteiro de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Foi especificada uma opção de espera na inicialização ou numa ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2603">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2604">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2605">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2606">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2607">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2622">Dados do apêndice ao fim do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2623">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2624">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2625">Este serviço anexa dados ao final do pacote especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2626">A área de dados fornecida é copiada para o pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2627">Se não houver memória suficiente disponível e a função de pacote acorrentado estiver ativada, um ou mais pacotes serão atribuídos para satisfazer o pedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2628">Se a função de pacote acorrentado não estiver ativada, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* é devolvida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2629">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2630">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2631">**data_start** Ponteiro para o início da área de dados do utilizador para anexar ao pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2632">**data_size** Tamanho da área de dados do utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2633">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote de piscina a partir do qual atribuir outro pacote se não houver espaço suficiente no pacote atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2634">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se não houver pacotes disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2635">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2638">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2639">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacote de sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Nenhum pacote disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) O tamanho do pacote não pode suportar o protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) O ponteiro prepend é inferior ao arranque da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice é maior do que a extremidade da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Piscina inválida, pacote ou dados Pointer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Tamanho de dados inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Opção de espera inválida de não-leitura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2649">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2650">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs (controladores de rede de aplicações)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2651">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2652">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2653">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2668">Extrair dados do pacote através de uma compensação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2669">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2670">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2671">Este serviço copia dados de um pacote NetX Duo (ou cadeia de pacotes) a partir da compensação especificada a partir do ponteiro pré-final do pacote do tamanho especificado em bytes no tampão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2672">O número de bytes copiados é devolvido em *bytes_copied.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2673">Este serviço não remove dados do pacote, nem ajusta o ponteiro pré-conjunto ou outras informações internas do estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2674">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2675">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote para extrair</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2676">**compensar** Compensado do ponteiro pré-final atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2677">**buffer_start** Ponteiro para o início do tampão de poupança</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2678">**buffer_length** Número de bytes para copiar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2679">**bytes_copied** Número de bytes realmente copiados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2680">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cópia de pacote de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Foi fornecido valor de compensação inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de pacote inválido ou ponteiro tampão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2684">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2685">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2686">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2687">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2693">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2693">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2694">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2694">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2695">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2695">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2697">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2697">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2699">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2699">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2700">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2700">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2702">Recuperar dados do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2704">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2705">Este serviço copia os dados do pacote fornecido no tampão fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2706">O número real de bytes copiados é devolvido no destino apontado por **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2707">Note que este serviço não altera o estado interno do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2708">Os dados que estão a ser recuperados ainda estão disponíveis no pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2709">*O tampão de destino deve ser grande o suficiente para manter o conteúdo do pacote. Caso contrário, a memória será corrompida causando resultados imprevisíveis*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2710">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2711">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o pacote de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2712">**buffer_start** Ponteiro para o início da área tampão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2713">**bytes_copied** Ponteiro para o destino para o número de bytes copiados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2714">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de dados de pacotes bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2716">**pacote** inválido NX_INVALID_PACKET (0x12).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Pacote inválido, arranque do tampão ou bytes ponteiros copiados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2718">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2719">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2720">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2721">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2722">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2737">Obtenha o comprimento dos dados do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2738">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2739">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2740">Este serviço obtém o comprimento dos dados no pacote especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2741">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2742">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2743">**comprimento** Destino para o comprimento do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2744">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Comprimento do pacote bem sucedido obter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2747">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2748">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2749">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2750">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2751">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2766">Criar piscina de pacotes na área de memória especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2767">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2768">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2769">Este serviço cria um conjunto de pacotes do tamanho especificado do pacote na área de memória fornecida pelo utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2770">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2771">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de piscina de pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2772">**nome** Ponteiro para o nome da aplicação para a piscina de pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2773">**payload_size** Número de bytes em cada pacote na piscina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2774">Este valor deve ser de, pelo menos, 40 bytes e deve ser igualmente divisível por 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2775">**memory_ptr** Ponteiro para a área de memória para colocar a piscina de pacotes dentro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2776">O ponteiro deve ser alinhado num limite ULONG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2777">**memory_size** Tamanho da área de memória da piscina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2778">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de pacotes bem sucedidos criar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Piscina inválida ou ponteiro de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Bloco inválido ou tamanho da memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2783">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2784">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2785">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2786">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2787">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2802">Eliminar piscina de pacotes previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2803">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2804">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2805">Este serviço elimina um pacote de pacotes previamente criado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2806">NetX Duo verifica quaisquer fios atualmente suspensos em pacotes na piscina de pacotes e limpa a suspensão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2807">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2808">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo da piscina de pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2809">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacotes de sucesso eliminar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de piscina inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2813">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2814">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2815">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2816">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2817">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2817">Example</span></span>

```c
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully

```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2832">Recuperar informações sobre uma piscina de pacotes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2833">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2834">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2835">Este serviço obtém informações sobre a piscina de pacotes especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2836">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2837">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2838">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para piscina de pacotes previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2839">**total_packets** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de pacotes na piscina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2840">**free_packets** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pacotes atualmente gratuitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pedidos de atribuição quando a piscina estava vazia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de suspensões de piscina vazias.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de lançamentos de pacotes inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2844">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações de piscina de pacotes bem sucedidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2848">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2849">Inicialização, fios e temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2850">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2852">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2867">Definir pacote piscina baixa marca de água</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2868">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2869">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2870">Este serviço configura a marca de água baixa para a piscina de pacotes especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2871">Uma vez definido o baixo valor da marca de água, o TCP ou a UDP não fazem fila dos pacotes recebidos se o número de pacotes disponíveis na piscina for inferior à marca de água baixa da piscina, impedindo que a piscina do pacote seja esfomeada de pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2872">Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2873">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2874">**pool_ptr** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de piscina de pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2875">**low_watermark** Baixo valor de marca de água a configurar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2876">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o baixo valor da marca de água.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) A função de marca de água baixa não está incorporada no NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de piscina inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2881">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2882">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2883">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2884">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2885">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2900">Liberação pacote previamente atribuído</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2902">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2903">Este serviço liberta um pacote, incluindo quaisquer pacotes adicionais acorrentados ao pacote especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2904">Se outro fio for bloqueado na atribuição do pacote, é dado o pacote e retomado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2905">*O pedido deve evitar a libertação de um pacote mais de uma vez, porque fazê-lo irá causar resultados imprevisíveis*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2906">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2907">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2908">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lançamento de pacote bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) O ponteiro prepend é inferior ao arranque da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice é maior do que a extremidade da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2913">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2914">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs (controladores de rede de aplicações)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2915">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2916">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2917">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```
