## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2932">Liberte um pacote transmitido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2933">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2934">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2935">Para pacotes não TCP, este serviço liberta um pacote transmitido, incluindo quaisquer pacotes adicionais acorrentados ao pacote especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2936">Se outro fio for bloqueado na atribuição do pacote, é dado o pacote e retomado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2937">Para um pacote TCP transmitido, o pacote é marcado como sendo transmitido, mas não libertado até que o pacote seja reconhecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2938">Este serviço é normalmente chamado do controlador de rede da aplicação após a transmissão de um pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2939">*O controlador de rede deve remover o cabeçalho dos meios de comunicação físicos e ajustar o comprimento do pacote antes de ligar para este serviço*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2940">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2941">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2942">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Libertação bem sucedida do pacote de transmissão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) O ponteiro prepend é inferior ao arranque da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice é maior do que a extremidade da carga útil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2947">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2948">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores, controladores de rede de aplicações (incluindo ISRs)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2949">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2950">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2951">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2966">Desativar o Protocolo de Resolução de Endereços Reversos (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2967">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2968">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2969">Este serviço desativa o componente RARP do NetX Duo para a instância IP específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2970">Para um sistema multihome, este serviço desativa o RARP em todas as interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2971">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2972">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2973">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RaRP com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP não estava ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2978">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2979">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2980">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2981">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2982">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2987">Ativar o Protocolo de Resolução de Endereços Reversos (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2988">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2989">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2990">Este serviço permite o componente RARP do NetX Duo para a instância IP específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2991">Os componentes RARP procuram através de todas as interfaces de rede anexas para um endereço IP zero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2992">Um endereço IP zero indica que a interface ainda não tem a atribuição de endereço IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2993">A RARP tenta resolver o endereço IP, permitindo o processo RARP nessa interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2994">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2995">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2996">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RARP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** endereço IP (0x21) já é válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP já estava ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3002">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3003">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3004">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3005">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3006">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3011">Recuperar informações sobre as atividades da RARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3012">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3013">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3014">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades da RARP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3015">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3016">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3017">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de pedidos de RARP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de respostas RARP recebidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de mensagens inválidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3021">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações rarp bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3026">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3027">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3028">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3029">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3030">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3035">Inicialize o Sistema NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3035">Initialize NetX Duo System</span></span>


## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3075">Ligação da tomada TCP do cliente à porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3076">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3077">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3078">Este serviço liga a tomada do cliente TCP previamente criada à porta TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3079">As tomadas TCP válidas variam de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3080">Se a porta TCP especificada não estiver disponível, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3081">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3082">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3083">**número da porta** para ligar (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3084">Se o número da porta for NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), a instância IP procurará a próxima porta livre e usará-a para a encadernação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3085">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se a porta já está ligada a outra tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3086">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3089">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3090">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomada bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) Esta tomada já está ligada a outra porta TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) O porto já está ligado a uma tomada diferente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) Não há porta livre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3096">**porta NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3100">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3101">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3102">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3103">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3104">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3129">Ligue a tomada TCP do cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3130">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3131">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3132">Este serviço liga a tomada do cliente TCP previamente criada e ligada à porta do servidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3133">As portas de servidores TCP válidas variam de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3134">Se a ligação não estiver concluída imediatamente, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3135">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3136">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3137">**server_ip** O endereço IP do servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3138">**server_port** Número da porta do servidor para ligar a\*\* (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3139">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta enquanto a ligação está sendo estabelecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3140">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3143">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3144">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomadas bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) A tomada não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) A tomada não se encontra fechada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Não foi especificada qualquer espera, a tentativa de ligação está em curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface inválida fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP do servidor inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3160">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3185">Obtenha o número da porta vinculado à tomada TCP do cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3186">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3187">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3188">Este serviço recupera o número de porta associado à tomada, o que é útil para encontrar a porta atribuída pela NetX Duo em situações em que o NX_ANY_PORT foi especificado no momento em que a tomada foi ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3189">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3190">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3191">**port_ptr** Ponteiro para o destino para o número da porta de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3192">Os números de porta válidos são (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3193">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomada bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Esta tomada não está ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida ou ponteiro de retorno da porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3199">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3200">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3201">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3202">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3203">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3228">Tomada de cliente unbind TCP da porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3229">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3230">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3231">Este serviço liberta a encadernação entre a tomada do cliente TCP e uma porta TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3232">Se houver outros fios à espera de ligar outra tomada ao mesmo número de porta, o primeiro fio suspenso fica ligado a esta porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3233">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3234">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3235">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tomada desaderada com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não estava ligada a nenhuma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) A tomada não foi desligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3242">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3243">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3244">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3245">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3246">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3271">Ativar o componente TCP do NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3272">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3273">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3274">Este serviço permite o componente do Protocolo de Controlo de Transmissão (TCP) da NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3275">Após ativação, as ligações TCP podem ser estabelecidas pelo pedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3276">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3277">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3278">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP já está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3283">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3284">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3285">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3286">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3287">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3312">Encontre a próxima porta TCP disponível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3313">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3314">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3315">Este serviço tenta localizar uma porta TCP gratuita (desvinculada) a partir da porta fornecida pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3316">A lógica de pesquisa irá envolver-se se a pesquisa atingir o valor máximo da porta de 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3317">Se a pesquisa for bem sucedida, a porta livre é devolvida na variável apontada por *free_port_ptr*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3318">*Este serviço pode ser chamado de outro fio e ter a mesma porta devolvida. Para evitar esta condição de regata, a aplicação pode pretender colocar este serviço e a tomada do cliente em si liga-se sob a proteção de um mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3319">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3320">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3321">**porto** Número da porta para iniciar a pesquisa em (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3322">**free_port_ptr** Ponteiro para o destino valor de retorno de porto livre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3323">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Achado de porta livre com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) Não foram encontradas portas livres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) O número de porta especificado é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3330">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3331">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3332">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3333">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3334">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3359">Recuperar informações sobre atividades da TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3360">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3361">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3362">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades da TCP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3363">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pacotes TCP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de bytes TCP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes TCP recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de bytes TCP recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3411">Aceitar ligação TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3412">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3413">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3414">Este serviço aceita (ou prepara-se para aceitar) um pedido de ligação ao cliente TCP para uma porta previamente configurada para escuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3415">Este serviço pode ser chamado imediatamente após a aplicação chamar o serviço de escuta ou de re-escuta ou depois de a rotina de chamada de escuta ser chamada quando a ligação do cliente estiver realmente presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3416">Se uma ligação não puder ser estabelecida imediatamente, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3417">*A aplicação deve ligar **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** depois de a ligação já não ser necessária para remover a ligação da tomada do servidor à porta do servidor*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3418">*As rotinas de chamada de aplicação são chamadas a partir do fio de ajuda do IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3419">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3420">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da tomada do servidor TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3421">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta enquanto a ligação está sendo estabelecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3422">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3425">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3426">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A tomada do servidor TCP bem sucedida aceita (ligação passiva).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) A tomada do servidor fornecida não está num estado de escuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Não foi especificada qualquer espera, a tentativa de ligação está em curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Erro do ponteiro da tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3434">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3434">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3435">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3435">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3436">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3436">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3437">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3437">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3438">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3463">Ativar a escuta da ligação do cliente na porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3464">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3465">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3466">Este serviço permite ouvir um pedido de ligação ao cliente na porta TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3467">Quando um pedido de ligação ao cliente é recebido, a tomada do servidor fornecida fica ligada à porta especificada e a função de chamada de chamada de chamada de ouvido fornecida é chamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3468">O processamento da rotina de chamada de escuta está completamente à altura da aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3469">Pode conter lógica para acordar um fio de aplicação que posteriormente executa uma operação de aceitação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3470">Se a aplicação já tiver um fio suspenso no processamento de aceitação para esta tomada, a rotina de chamada de escuta pode não ser necessária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3471">Se a aplicação pretender manusear ligações adicionais ao cliente na mesma porta, o ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** deve ser chamado com uma tomada disponível (uma tomada no estado FECHADO) para a próxima ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3472">Até que o serviço de re-ouvir seja chamado, as ligações adicionais do cliente são em fila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3473">Quando a profundidade máxima da fila é excedida, o pedido de ligação mais antigo é retirado a favor da fila do novo pedido de ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3474">A profundidade máxima da fila é especificada por este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3475">*As rotinas de chamada de aplicação são chamadas a partir do fio interno do ajudante IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3476">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3477">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3478">**porto** Número da porta para ouvir (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3479">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada a utilizar para a ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3480">**listen_queue_size** Número de pedidos de ligação ao cliente que podem ser na fila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3481">**listen_callback** Função de aplicação para ligar quando a ligação é recebida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3482">Se for especificado um NU, a função de chamada de escuta é desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3483">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Porta TCP bem sucedida ouvir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) Não há mais estruturas de pedido de escuta disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3486">A NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS constante em **_nx_api.h_** define quantos pedidos de escuta ativa são possíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) A tomada do servidor fornecida não está fechada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) A tomada do servidor fornecida já está ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) Já existe um pedido de escuta ativo para este porto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Porta inválida especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3494">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3494">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3498">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3498">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3525">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3526">Este serviço é chamado depois de ter sido recebida uma ligação numa porta que foi configurada anteriormente para escuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3527">O principal objetivo deste serviço é fornecer uma nova tomada de servidor para a próxima ligação ao cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3528">Se um pedido de ligação for feito em fila, a ligação será processada imediatamente durante esta chamada de serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3529">*A mesma rotina de chamada especificada pelo pedido de escuta original também é chamada quando existe uma ligação para esta nova tomada do servidor*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3530">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3533">**socket_ptr** Tomada para utilizar para a próxima ligação ao cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3534">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Porta TCP bem sucedida a ouvir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) A tomada do servidor fornecida não está fechada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) A tomada do servidor fornecida já está ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) Já existe um ponteiro de tomada válido para esta porta ou a porta especificada não tem um pedido de escuta ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) O mesmo que NX_SUCCESS, exceto que houve um pedido de ligação em fila e foi processado durante esta chamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ouvir o ponteiro de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
