### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3548">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3575">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3575">Description</span></span>

NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);

          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3615">Desativar a escuta da ligação ao cliente na porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3615">Disable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3616">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3616">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3617">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3618">Este serviço desativa a audição de um pedido de ligação ao cliente na porta TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3618">This service disables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3619">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3620">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3620">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3621">**porto** Número de portas para desativar a audição (0 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3621">**port** Number of port to disable listening (0 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3622">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3622">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP bem sucedido ouvir desativar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP listen disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) A audição não estava ativada para a porta especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Listening was not enabled for the specified port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Porta inválida especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3630">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3633">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3633">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL       my_pool;
NX_IP                my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET        server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

     /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
     tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{

     /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
        doesn't use this callback.*/
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

     /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
        of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
       "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
     */

     /* Create the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

     /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                 port_12_connect_request);

     /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
        each client and then disconnecting. */
     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
     {

         /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request is
            present. */
         tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

         /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to complete.*/
         status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

         /* Check for a successful connection. */
         if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
         {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"), &my_pool,
                                   NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
          }

          /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even if
             disconnect or accept fails. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

          /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
  
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3704">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3705">Este serviço cria um cliente TCP ou tomada de servidor para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3706">*As rotinas de chamada de aplicação são chamadas a partir do fio associado a esta instância IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3707">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3708">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3709">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para o novo bloco de controlo da tomada TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3710">**nome** Nome da aplicação para esta tomada TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3711">**type_of_service** Define o tipo de serviço para a transmissão, os valores legais são os seguintes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3717">**fragmento** Especifica se é permitida a fragmentação ip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3718">Se for especificado NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0), é permitida a fragmentação ip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3719">Se NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) for especificado, a fragmentação ip está desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3720">**time_to_live** Especifica o valor de 8 bits que define quantos routers este pacote pode passar antes de ser jogado fora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3721">O valor predefinido é especificado por NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3722">**window_size** Define o número máximo de bytes permitidos na fila de receção para esta tomada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Função de aplicação que é chamada sempre que os dados urgentes são detetados no fluxo de receção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3724">Se este valor for NX_NULL, os dados urgentes são ignorados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3725">**disconnect_callback** Função de aplicação que é chamada sempre que uma desconexão é emitida pela tomada na outra extremidade da ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3726">Se este valor for NX_NULL, a função de desconexão é desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3727">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tomada de cliente bem sucedida da TCP criar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Tipo de serviço inválido, fragmento, tamanho da janela inválido ou opção de tempo-tolive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3733">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3734">Inicialização e Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3735">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3736">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3737">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3762">Eliminar tomada TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3764">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3765">Este serviço elimina uma tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3766">Se a tomada ainda estiver ligada ou ligada, o serviço devolve um código de erro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3768">**socket_ptr** Tomada TCP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3769">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Apagar a tomada com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) A tomada ainda está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3805">Desligue as ligações de tomada de cliente e servidor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3806">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3807">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3808">Este serviço desliga uma ligação estabelecida de tomada de cliente ou servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3809">Uma desconexão de uma tomada do servidor deve ser seguida por um pedido não aceite, enquanto uma tomada de cliente desligada é deixada num estado pronto para outro pedido de ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3810">Se o processo de desconexão não puder terminar imediatamente, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3811">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3812">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada de cliente ou servidor previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3813">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta enquanto a desconexão está em curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3814">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3817">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3818">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desconexão de tomadas com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A tomada especificada não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) A desconexão está em curso, não foi especificada qualquer espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3830">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3855">Instalar a desconexão TCP completa notificar a função de retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3856">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3857">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3858">Este serviço regista uma função de retorno que é invocada após a conclusão de uma operação de desconexão da tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3859">A função de chamada completa da tomada TCP está disponível se o NetX Duo for construído com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3860">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3861">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada de cliente ou servidor previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** A função de retorno a instalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3863">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) registou com sucesso a função de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) A função de notificação alargada não é incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3868">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3869">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3869">Initialization, threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3871">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3871">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3872">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3872">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the disconnect complete notify callback function. */

```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3886">Definir TCP estabelecer notificação função de retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3887">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3888">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3889">Este serviço regista uma função de retorno, que é chamada depois de uma tomada TCP fazer uma ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3890">A tomada TCP estabelece a função de retorno de chamada se o NetX Duo for construído com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3891">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3892">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada de cliente ou servidor previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Função de retorno invocada após a criação de uma ligação TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3894">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) define com sucesso a função de notificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) A funcionalidade de notificação alargada não está integrada na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP não foi habilitado pelo pedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3900">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3901">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3902">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3903">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3904">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3904">Example</span></span>

```c

```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3919">Recuperar informações sobre as atividades da tomada de TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3920">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3921">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3922">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades da tomada TCP para a instância de tomada TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3923">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3924">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3925">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pacotes TCP enviados na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de bytes TCP enviados na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes TCP recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de bytes TCP recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de retransmissão de pacotes TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes TCP em fila na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes TCP com erros de verificação na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Ponteiro para o destino do estado atual da tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de transmissão ainda em fila à espera de ACK.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Ponteiro para o destino do tamanho atual da janela de transmissão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Ponteiro para o destino da corrente receber o tamanho da janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3937">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações de tomadas TCP bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3942">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3943">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3944">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3946">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3971">Obtenha MSS de tomada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3972">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3973">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3974">Este serviço recupera o tamanho máximo de segmento local (MSS) da tomada especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3975">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3976">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3977">**mss** Destino para o regresso da MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3978">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) MSS bem sucedidos obtêm.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Tomada inválida ou ponteiro de destino MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio ou inicialização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3983">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3984">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3985">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3986">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-3987">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4002">Obtenha MSS da tomada TCP par</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4003">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4004">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4005">Este serviço recupera o Tamanho Máximo do Segmento (MSS) anunciado pela tomada de pares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4006">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4007">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada previamente criada e conectada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4008">**mss** Destino para devolver o MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4009">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) MSS de sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Tomada inválida ou ponteiro de destino MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio ou inicialização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4015">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4015">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4017">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4018">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4033">Definir MSS de tomada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4034">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4035">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4036">Este serviço define o tamanho máximo do segmento da tomada especificada (MSS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4037">Note que o valor MSS deve estar dentro da interface de rede IP MTU, permitindo espaço para cabeçalhos IP e TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4038">Este serviço deve ser utilizado antes de uma tomada TCP iniciar o processo de ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4039">Se o serviço for utilizado após a criação de uma ligação TCP, o novo valor não tem qualquer efeito na ligação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4040">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4041">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4042">**mss** Valor da MSS para definir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4043">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto MSS bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) O valor especificado de MSS é demasiado elevado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A ligação TCP não foi estabelecida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller não é um fio ou inicialização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4050">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4051">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4052">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4053">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4054">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4069">Recuperar informações sobre a tomada de TCP do par</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4071">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4072">Este serviço recupera o endereço IP e informações de porta para a tomada TCP conectada sobre a rede IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4073">O serviço equivalente que também suporta a rede IPv6 é ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4074">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4075">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4076">**peer_ip_address** Ponteiro para destino para endereço IP peer, em ordem byte anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4077">**peer_port** Ponteiro para destino para número de porta de pares, em ordem byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4078">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) O Serviço executa com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4080">O endereço IP peer e o número da porta são devolvidos ao chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A tomada não se encontra ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiros inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4085">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4085">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4086">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4086">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4087">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4087">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4088">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4088">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4089">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4089">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Obtain peer IP address and port on the specified TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(&my_socket, &peer_ip_address,
                                     &peer_port);

/* If status = NX_SUCCESS, the data was successfully obtained. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4104">Definir a função de notificação de fila de transmissão TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4106">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4107">Este serviço define a função de notificação de profundidade de fila de transmissão especificada pela aplicação, que é chamada sempre que a tomada especificada determina que libertou pacotes da fila de transmissão de modo a que a profundidade da fila já não exceda o seu limite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4108">Se uma aplicação for bloqueada no transmissor devido à profundidade da fila, a função de retorno serve como uma notificação à aplicação de que pode voltar a transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4109">Este serviço só está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4110">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4111">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a estrutura da tomada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** A função de notificação a instalar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4113">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) instalou com sucesso a função de notificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) A funcionalidade de notificação de profundidade da fila da tomada TCP não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido para o bloco de controlo da tomada ou para a função de notificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4119">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4120">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4121">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4122">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4123">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4138">Receber dados da tomada TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4139">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4140">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4141">Este serviço recebe dados de TCP da tomada especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4142">Se não forem dados na tomada especificada, o chamador suspende com base na opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4143">*Se NX_SUCCESS for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido quando já não for necessário*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4144">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4145">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4146">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para ponteiro de pacoteS TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4147">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se os dados estão atualmente em fila nesta tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4148">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4151">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4152">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Os dados de tomadas bem sucedidos recebem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) A tomada ainda não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Nenhum dado recebido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A tomada já não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Tomada inválida ou ponteiro do pacote de devolução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4161">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4162">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4163">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4164">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4165">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```
