## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4190">Notificar a aplicação dos pacotes recebidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4191">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4192">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4193">Este serviço configura o ponteiro de função de notificação de receção com a função de retorno especificado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4194">Esta função de retorno é então chamada sempre que um ou mais pacotes são recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4195">Se for fornecido um ponteiro NX_NULL, a função de notificação é desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4196">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4197">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a tomada TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** O ponteiro da função de retorno da aplicação que é chamado quando um ou mais pacotes são recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4199">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A tomada de sucesso recebe a notificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4204">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4205">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4206">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4207">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4208">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4223">Enviar dados através de uma tomada TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4224">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4225">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4226">Este serviço envia dados de TCP através de uma tomada TCP previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4227">Se o último tamanho da janela anunciado pelo recetor for inferior a este pedido, o serviço suspende opcionalmente com base na opção de espera especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4228">Este serviço garante que nenhum dado de pacote maior do que o MSS é enviado para a camada IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4229">*A menos que um erro seja devolvido, o pedido não deve libertar o pacote após esta chamada. Ao fazê-lo, o condutor da rede também tentará libertar o pacote após a transmissão*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4230">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4231">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4232">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote de dados da TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4233">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se o pedido for maior do que o tamanho da janela do recetor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4234">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4237">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4238">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Envio de tomadas bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não estava ligada a nenhuma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não foi encontrada nenhuma interface de saída adequada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A tomada já não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) O pedido é maior do que o tamanho da janela anunciado pelo recetor em bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Pacote não é atribuído.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Foi atingida a profundidade máxima da fila de transmissão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) O ponteiro de preparação do pacote é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4252">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4253">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4254">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4255">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4256">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4281">Aguarde que a tomada TCP entre em estado específico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4282">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4283">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4284">Este serviço aguarda que a tomada entre no estado pretendido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4285">Se a tomada não estiver no estado pretendido, o serviço suspende de acordo com a opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4286">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4287">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada TCP previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4288">**desired_state** Estado de TCP desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4289">Os estados de tomada TCP válidos são definidos da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4301">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se o estado solicitado não estiver presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4302">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4304">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 através de 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4305">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Espera de estado bem-sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4317">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4342">Instale o callback para o estado de espera cronometrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4343">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4344">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4345">Este serviço regista uma função de retorno que é invocada quando a tomada TCP está em estado de espera cronometrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4346">Para utilizar este serviço, a biblioteca NetX Duo deve ser construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4347">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4348">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada de cliente ou servidor previamente ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** A função de retorno de espera cronometrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4350">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) regista com sucesso a tomada de função de retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) a biblioteca NetX Duo é construída sem a funcionalidade de notificação estendida ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4356">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4357">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4358">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4360">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4375">Configurar os parâmetros de transmissão da tomada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4377">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4378">Este serviço configura vários parâmetros de transmissão da tomada TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4379">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4380">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a tomada TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4381">**max_queue_depth** Número máximo de pacotes autorizados a ser em fila para transmissão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4382">**tempo limite** O número de marcadores ThreadX marca um ACK é esperado antes do pacote ser enviado novamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4383">**max_retries** Número máximo de retró assim que é permitido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4384">**timeout_shift** Valor para deslocar o tempo limite para cada relemque subsequente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4385">Um valor de 0, resulta no mesmo intervalo entre as sucessivas retrações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4386">Um valor de 1, duplica o tempo limite entre as retrações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4387">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Configuração de tomada de transmissão bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Opção de profundidade de fila inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4393">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4394">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4395">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4396">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4397">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4412">Notifique a aplicação de atualizações do tamanho da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4413">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4414">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4415">Este serviço instala uma rotina de chamada de atualização da janela da tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4416">Esta rotina é chamada automaticamente sempre que a tomada especificada recebe um pacote indicando um aumento no tamanho da janela do hospedeiro remoto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4417">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4418">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada TCP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Rotina de chamada a ser chamada quando o tamanho da janela muda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4420">Um valor de NULO desativa a atualização da alteração da janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4421">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A rotina de chamada é instalada na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiros inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) funcionalidade TCP não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4426">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4427">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4428">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4429">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4430">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4445">Ativar o componente UDP do NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4445">Enable UDP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4446">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4447">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4448">Este serviço permite o componente do Protocolo de Datagram do Utilizador (UDP) da NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4449">Após ativação, os datagramas da UDP podem ser enviados e recebidos pelo pedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4450">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4451">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4452">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4452">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) UDP bem sucedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Este componente já foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4457">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4458">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4458">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4459">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4459">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4460">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4460">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4461">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4461">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable UDP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP is now enabled on the specified IP
   instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4485">Encontre a próxima porta UDP disponível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4486">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4487">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4488">Este serviço procura uma porta UDP gratuita (não ligada) a partir do número de porta fornecido pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4489">A lógica de pesquisa irá envolver-se se a pesquisa atingir o valor máximo da porta de 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4490">Se a pesquisa for bem sucedida, a porta livre é devolvida na variável apontada por free_port_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4491">*Este serviço pode ser chamado de outro fio e pode ter a mesma porta devolvida. Para evitar esta condição de regata, a aplicação pode pretender colocar este serviço e a tomada efetiva ligada sob a proteção de um mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4492">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4493">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4494">**porto** Número da porta para iniciar a pesquisa (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4495">**free_port_ptr** Ponteiro para a variável de retorno de porto livre de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4496">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Achado de porta livre com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) Não foram encontradas portas livres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) O número de porta especificado é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4503">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4504">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4505">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4506">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4507">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4531">Recuperar informações sobre atividades da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4532">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4533">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4534">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades da UDP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4535">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4536">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4537">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pacotes UDP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de bytes UDP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4540">**udp_packets_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes UDP recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de bytes UDP recebidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes UDP inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** O ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de receção UDP caiu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes UDP com erros de checkum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4545">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações bem sucedidas da UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4550">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4551">Inicialização, fios e temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4551">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4552">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4554">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4554">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4578">Extrair parâmetros de rede do pacote UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4579">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4580">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4581">Este serviço extrai parâmetros de rede, tais como endereço IPv4, número de porta de pares, tipo de protocolo (este serviço devolve sempre o tipo UDP) de um pacote recebido numa interface de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4582">Para obter informações sobre um pacote proveniente da rede IPv4 ou IPv6, a aplicação utilizará o ***serviço nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4583">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4584">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4585">**ip_address** Ponteiro para o endereço IP remetente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4586">**protocolo** Ponteiro para o protocolo (UDP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4587">**porto** Ponteiro para o número da porta do remetente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4588">**interface_index** Ponteiro para receber índice de interface.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4589">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dados de interface de pacote extraídos com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) O pacote não contém quadro IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Entrada inválida do ponteiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4594">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4595">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4595">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4596">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4596">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4597">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4597">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4598">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4598">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4622">Ligue a tomada UDP à porta UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4623">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4624">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4625">Este serviço liga a tomada UDP previamente criada à porta UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4626">As tomadas UDP válidas variam de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4627">Se o número de porta solicitado estiver ligado a outra tomada, este serviço aguarda por um período de tempo especificado para que a tomada se desvincula do número da porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4628">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4629">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4630">**porto** Número da porta para ligar a\*\* (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4631">Se o número da porta for NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), a instância IP procurará a próxima porta livre e usará-a para a encadernação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4632">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se a porta já está ligada a outra tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4633">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4636">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4637">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomada bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) Esta tomada já está ligada a outra porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) O porto já está ligado a uma tomada diferente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) Não há porta livre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Porta inválida especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4647">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4648">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4648">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4649">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4649">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4650">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4651">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4675">Recupera o número de bytes disponíveis para recuperação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4677">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4678">Este serviço recupera o número de bytes disponíveis para receção na tomada UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4678">This service retrieves number of bytes available for reception in the specified UDP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4679">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4680">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4680">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4681">**bytes_available** Ponteiro para destino para bytes disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4681">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4682">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4682">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bytes de sucesso disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful bytes available retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Tomada não ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiros inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** funcionalidade UDP (0x14) não está ativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4688">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4689">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4689">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4690">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4690">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4691">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4691">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4692">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4692">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval from the UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,
                                       &bytes_available);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the number of bytes was successfully
   retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4716">Desativar a parte de verificação da tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4717">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4718">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4719">Este serviço desativa a lógica de checkum para o envio e receção de pacotes na tomada UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4720">Quando a lógica de checkum é desativada, um valor de zero é carregado no campo de verificação do cabeçalho UDP para todos os pacotes enviados através desta tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4721">Um valor de dados de valor zero no cabeçalho UDP indica ao recetor que a parte de verificação não é calculada para este pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4722">Note também que tal não tem qualquer efeito se **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** e **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** forem definidos ao receber e enviar pacotes UDP respectivamente,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4723">Note que este serviço não tem qualquer efeito nos pacotes na rede IPv6, uma vez que a UDP checksum é obrigatória para o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4724">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4725">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4726">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desativação de verificação de tomadas bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) A tomada não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4732">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4733">Inicialização, fios, temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4734">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4736">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4760">Ativar a parte de verificação da tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4761">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4762">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4763">Este serviço permite a lógica de checkum para o envio e receção de pacotes na tomada UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4764">A função de verificação abrange toda a área de dados da UDP, bem como um cabeçalho pseudo-IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4765">Note também que isso não tem qualquer efeito se **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** e **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** forem definidos ao receber e enviar pacotes UDP respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4766">Note que este serviço não tem qualquer efeito sobre os pacotes na rede IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4767">A udp checksum é obrigatória no IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4768">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4769">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4769">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4770">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4770">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ativar a tomada de verificação com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) A tomada não está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4776">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4777">Inicialização, fios, temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4777">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4778">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4779">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4780">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will have a checksum
   calculated. */
```
