## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4804">Criar tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4805">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4806">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4807">Este serviço cria uma tomada UDP para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4808">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4809">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4810">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para o novo bloco de controlo de tomadas UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4811">**nome** Nome da aplicação para esta tomada UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4812">**type_of_service** Define o tipo de serviço para a transmissão, os valores legais são os seguintes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4818">**fragmento Especifica** se a fragmentação IP é ou não permitida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4819">Se NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) for especificado, é permitida a fragmentação ip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4820">Se NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) for especificado, a fragmentação ip está desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4821">**time_to_live** Especifica o valor de 8 bits que define quantos routers este pacote pode passar antes de ser jogado fora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4822">O valor predefinido é especificado por NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4823">**queue_maximum** Define o número máximo de datagramas da UDP que podem ser pré-visualizados para esta tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4824">Após o limite de fila ser atingido, para cada novo pacote recebido o pacote UDP mais antigo é lançado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4859">Eliminar tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4860">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4861">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4862">Este serviço elimina uma tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4863">Se a tomada estava ligada a uma porta, a tomada deve ser desaderada primeiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4864">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4865">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4866">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Apagar a tomada com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) A tomada ainda está ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4872">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4873">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4874">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4875">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4876">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_delete(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4900">Recuperar informações sobre as atividades da tomada da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4902">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4903">Este serviço obtém informações sobre as atividades da tomada UDP para a instância de tomada UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4904">*Se um ponteiro de destino for NX_NULL, essa informação específica não é devolvida ao chamador*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4905">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4906">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Ponteiro para o destino para o número total de pacotes UDP enviados na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Ponteiro para destino para o número total de bytes UDP enviados na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4909">**udp_packets_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes UDP recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de bytes UDP recebidos na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de UDP em fila na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** O ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes de receção UDP caiu para tomada devido ao tamanho da fila ser excedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Ponteiro para o destino do número total de pacotes UDP com erros de verificação na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4914">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperação de informações de tomadas UDP bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4923">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4947">Recolha o número da porta vinculado à tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4948">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4949">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4950">Este serviço recupera o número de porta associado à tomada, o que é útil para encontrar a porta atribuída pela NetX Duo em situações em que o NX_ANY_PORT foi especificado no momento em que a tomada foi ligada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4951">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4952">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4953">**port_ptr** Ponteiro para o destino para o número da porta de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4954">Os números de porta válidos são (1- 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4955">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomada bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Esta tomada não está ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida ou ponteiro de retorno da porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4961">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4962">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4963">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4964">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4965">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4989">Receber datagrama da tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4991">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4992">Este serviço recebe um datagrama de UDP a partir da tomada especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4993">Se não houver um datagrama na tomada especificada, o chamador suspende com base na opção de espera fornecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4994">*Se NX_SUCCESS for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido quando já não for necessário*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4995">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4996">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4997">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para o ponteiro do pacote de dados da UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4998">**wait_option** Define como o serviço se comporta se um datagram não estiver atualmente em fila nesta tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-4999">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5002">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5003">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Receber tomadas bem sucedidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não estava ligada a nenhuma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Não havia nenhum datagrama da UDP para receber.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Tomada inválida ou ponteiro de retorno do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5011">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5012">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5013">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5014">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5015">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5039">Notifique a aplicação de cada pacote recebido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5040">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5041">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5042">Este serviço define o ponteiro de função de notificação de receção à função de retorno especificado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5043">Esta função de retorno é então chamada sempre que um pacote é recebido na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5044">Se for fornecido um ponteiro NX_NULL, a função de notificação de receção é desativada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5045">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5046">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a tomada UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Ponteiro da função de retorno da aplicação que é chamado quando um pacote é recebido na tomada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5048">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) A tomada definida com sucesso recebem a função de notificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5051">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5052">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5053">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5054">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5055">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5079">Enviar um UDP Datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5080">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5081">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5082">Este serviço envia um datagrama de UDP através de uma tomada UDP previamente criada e ligada para redes IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5083">NetX Duo encontra um endereço IP local adequado como endereço de origem baseado no endereço IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5084">Para especificar uma interface específica e endereço IP de origem, a aplicação deve utilizar o serviço **nxd_udp_socket_source_send.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5085">Note que este serviço retorna imediatamente independentemente de o datagrama da UDP ter sido enviado com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5086">O serviço equivalente NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) é ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5087">A tomada deve estar ligada a um porto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5088">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5089">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5090">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote de datagrama da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5091">**ip_address** Endereço IPv4 de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5092">**porto** Número de porta de destino válido entre 1 e 0xFFFF), em encomenda byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5092">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5093">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Envio de tomada uDP bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não ligada a nenhuma porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP do servidor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para cabeçalho UDP no pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5100">**ponteiro de tomada** inválida NX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP não foi habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Número de porta não está dentro de um alcance válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5104">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5104">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5105">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5105">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5106">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5106">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5107">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5107">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5108">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5132">Enviar datagrama através da tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5133">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5134">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5135">Este serviço envia um datagrama de UDP através de uma tomada UDP previamente criada e ligada através da interface de rede com o endereço IP especificado como endereço de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5136">Note que o serviço regressa imediatamente, independentemente de o datagrama da UDP ter sido enviado com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** funciona tanto para as redes IPv4 como para o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5138">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5139">**socket_ptr** Tomada para transmitir o pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5140">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote para transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5141">**ip_address** Endereço IP destino para enviar pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5142">**porto** Porto de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5143">**address_index** Índice do endereço associado à interface para enviar o pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5144">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet enviado com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não ligada a uma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IP inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** processamento de UDP (0x14) não está ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ponteiro de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Ponteiro de pré-final de pacote inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de endereços inválidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) O número do porto excede o número máximo de porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5155">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5156">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5157">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5158">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5159">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5183">Tomada UDP desaderada da porta UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5184">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5185">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5186">Este serviço liberta a encadernação entre a tomada UDP e uma porta UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5187">Quaisquer pacotes recebidos armazenados na fila de receção são libertados como parte da operação un encaderna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5188">Se houver outros fios à espera de ligar outra tomada à porta desvinculada, o primeiro fio suspenso fica então ligado à porta recém-desvinculada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5189">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5190">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5191">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tomada desaderada com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não estava ligada a nenhuma porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Este componente não foi ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5197">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5198">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5199">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5200">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5201">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5225">Extrair IP e enviar porta a partir do datagrama da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5227">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5228">Este serviço extrai o número de IP e porta do remetente dos cabeçalhos IP e UDP do programa de dados da UDP fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5229">Note que o ***serviço nxd_udp_source_extract*** funciona com pacotes da rede IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5230">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5231">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote de datagrama da UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5232">**ip_address** Ponteiro válido para a variável de endereço IP de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5233">**porto** Ponteiro válido para a variável porta de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5234">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Extração IP/porta de origem bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) O pacote fornecido é inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Pacote inválido ou IP ou destino portuário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5238">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5239">Inicialização, fios, temporizadores, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5240">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5242">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5266">Ativar serviços ICMPv4 e ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5267">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5268">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5269">Este serviço permite tanto os serviços ICMPv4 como ICMPv6 e só pode ser chamado após a criação da instância IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5270">O serviço pode ser ativado antes ou depois do IPv6 estar ativado (ver *nxd_ipv6_enable).*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5271">Os serviços ICMPv4 incluem Pedido de Eco/Resposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5272">Os serviços ICMPv6 incluem Pedido de Eco/Resposta, Descoberta de Vizinhos, Deteção de Endereços Duplicados, Descoberta do Router e configuração automática de endereços apátridas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5273">O equivalente IPv4 na NetX é *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5274">*Se o endereço IPv6 estiver configurado manualmente antes de ativar o ICMPv6, o IPv6 configurado manualmente não está sujeito ao processo de deteção de endereços duplicado*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* inicia serviços ICMP apenas para operações IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5276">As aplicações que utilizem os serviços ICMPv6 devem utilizar *nxd_icmp_enable* em vez de *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5277">Para utilizar a solicitação do router IPv6 e a configuração de endereço automático apátrida IPv6, o ICMPv6 deve ser ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5278">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5279">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5280">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) serviços ICMP estão habilitados com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5284">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5285">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5285">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5286">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5287">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5288">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for ICMP services. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5292">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5292">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5297">Executar pedidos de eco ICMPv4 ou ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5298">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5299">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5300">Este serviço envia um pacote ICMP Echo Request através de uma interface física apropriada e aguarda uma Resposta Echo do anfitrião do destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5301">A NetX Duo determina a interface adequada, com base no endereço de destino, para enviar a mensagem de ping .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5302">As aplicações devem utilizar o ***serviço nxd_icmp_source_ping*** para especificar a interface física e o endereço IP de origem precisa para utilizar para a transmissão de pacotes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5303">A instância IP deve ter sido criada e os serviços ICMPv4/ICMPv6 devem ser ativados (ver ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5304">Se NX_SUCCESS for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido depois de já não ser necessário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5305">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5306">**ip_ptr** Indicação para a instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5307">**ip_address** Endereço IP destino para ping, em encomenda byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5308">**data_ptr** Ponteiro para a área de dados do pacote de ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5309">**data_size** Número de bytes de dados de ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5310">**response_ptr** Ponteiro para ponteiro do pacote de resposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5311">**wait_option** Hora de esperar por uma resposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5312">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5314">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 através</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5316">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem-sucedido enviado e recebido ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Os dados do Ping excedem a carga útil do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) O anfitrião do destino não respondeu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de resposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ip ou componente ICMP não está ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O endereço IP de entrada é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5331">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5340">Executar pedidos de eco ICMPv4 ou ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5342">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5343">Este serviço envia um pacote ICMP Echo Request utilizando o índice especificado de um endereço IPv4 ou IPv6, e através da interface de rede o endereço de origem está associado, e aguarda uma Resposta de Eco do anfitrião do destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5344">Este serviço funciona com endereços IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5345">O parâmetro *address_index* indica o endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 de origem a utilizar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5346">Para o endereço IPv4, o *address_index* é o mesmo índice da interface de rede anexa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5347">Para o IPv6, o *address_index* indica a entrada na tabela de endereços IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5348">A instância IP deve ter sido criada e os serviços ICMPv4 e ICMPv6 devem ser ativados (ver *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5349">*Se NX_SUCCESS for devolvido, o pedido é responsável pela libertação do pacote recebido depois de já não ser necessário*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5350">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5351">**ip_ptr** Indicação para a instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5351">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5352">**ip_address** Endereço IP destino para ping, em encomenda byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5352">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5353">**address_index** Indica o endereço IP para usar como endereço de origem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5353">**address_index** Indicates the IP address to use as source address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5354">**data_ptr** Ponteiro para a área de dados do pacote de ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5354">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5355">**data_size** Número de bytes de dados de ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5355">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5356">**response_ptr** Ponteiro para ponteiro do pacote de resposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5356">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5357">**wait_option** Hora de esperar por uma resposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5357">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5358">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5358">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5360">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 através de 0xFFFFFFFE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5360">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5362">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5365">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Os dados do Ping excedem a carga útil do pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5365">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) O anfitrião do destino não respondeu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5368">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5368">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP inválido ou ponteiro de resposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5370">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5370">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ip ou componente ICMP não está ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5372">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) O endereço IP de entrada é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5372">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5377">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5403">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5403">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */
status = nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(&ip_0,
                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the callback function has
   been successfully configured. */
```
