## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5412">Enviar pacote IP cru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5413">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5414">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5415">Este serviço envia um pacote IPv4 ou IPv6 em bruto (sem cabeçalhos de protocolo de camada de transporte).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5416">Num sistema multihome, se o sistema não conseguir determinar uma interface adequada (por exemplo, se o endereço IP de destino for transmitido IPv4, multicast ou endereço multicast IPv6), o dispositivo principal é selecionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5417">O serviço \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ pode ser usado para especificar uma interface de saída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5418">O equivalente NetX é _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5419">A instância IP deve ser previamente criada e o manuseamento de pacotes IP crus deve ser ativado utilizando o serviço ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5420">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5421">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5422">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote para transmitir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5423">**destination_ip** Ponteiro para endereço de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5424">**protocolo** Protocolo de pacote armazenado no cabeçalho IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5425">**ttl** Valor para TTL ou limite de lúpulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5426">**tos** Valor para TOS ou classe de tráfego e etiqueta de fluxo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5427">Devolver Valor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pacote IP cru enviado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Tratamento IP bruto não habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para cabeçalho IPv4 ou IPv6 no pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido ou ponteiro de pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Entrada de endereço IPv6 não válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5437">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5438">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5439">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5440">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5441">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5452">Enviar pacotes brutos usando endereço de origem especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5453">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5454">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5455">Este serviço envia um pacote IPv4 ou IPv6 em bruto utilizando o endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 especificado como endereço de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5456">Este serviço é normalmente utilizado num sistema multihome, se o sistema não conseguir determinar uma interface adequada (por exemplo, se o endereço IP de destino for transmitido IPv4, multicast ou endereço multicast IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5457">O parâmetro *address_index* permite que a aplicação especifique o endereço de origem a utilizar ao enviar este pacote cru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5458">A instância IP deve ser previamente criada e o manuseamento de pacotes IP crus deve ser ativado utilizando o serviço ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5459">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5460">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5461">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote para enviar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5462">**destination_ip** Endereço IP de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5463">**address_index** Indexar os endereços IPv4 ou IPv6 para usar como endereço de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5464">**protocolo** Valor para o campo do protocolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5465">**ttl** Valor para ttl ou limite de lúpulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5466">**tos** Valor para tos ou classe de tráfego e rótulo de fluxo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5467">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet é enviado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para cabeçalho IPv4 ou IPv6 no pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido para bloco de controlo IP, pacote ou destination_ip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Processamento bruto não habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Erro de endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de interface inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Entrada de endereço IPv6 não válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5477">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5477">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5478">Fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5478">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5479">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5479">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5480">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5481">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5492">Definir alteração de endereço ipv6 notificar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5494">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5495">Este serviço regista uma rotina de chamada de chamada de aplicação que o NetX Duo chama sempre que o Endereço IPv6 é alterado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5496">Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída é a opção ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5497">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5498">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Função de retorno de aplicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) a funcionalidade de notificação de alteração de endereço iPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5510">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5536">Apagar endereço IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5538">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5539">Este serviço elimina o endereço IPv6 no índice especificado na tabela de endereços IPv6 da instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5540">Não há equivalente NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5541">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5542">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5543">**address_index** Tabela de endereços IPv6 de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5544">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Endereço eliminado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está integrado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5550">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5551">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5552">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5554">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5580">Recuperar endereço e prefixo IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5581">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5582">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5583">Este serviço recupera o endereço e prefixo IPv6 no índice especificado na tabela de endereços da instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5584">O índice da interface física com o qual o endereço IPv6 está associado é devolvido no *ponteiro interface_index.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5585">Os serviços equivalentes NetX são ***nx_ip_address_get** _ e _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5586">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5587">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5588">**address_index** Tabela de endereços de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5589">**ip_address** Ponteiro para o endereço a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5590">**prefix_length** Comprimento do prefixo do endereço (máscara de sub-rede)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5591">**interface_index** Ponteiro para o índice da interface</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5592">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Sem endereço de interface, ou address_index inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5598">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5599">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5600">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5601">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5602">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5628">Definir endereço iPv6 e prefixo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5628">Set IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5629">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5630">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5631">Este serviço define o endereço EPv6 fornecido e prefixo para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5631">This service sets the supplied IPv6 address and prefix to the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5632">Se o *argumento address_index* não for nulo, o índice na tabela de endereços IPv6 onde o endereço é inserido é devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5632">If the *address_index* argument is not null, the index into the IPv6 address table where the address is inserted is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5633">Os serviços equivalentes NetX são ***nx_ip_address_set** _ e _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5633">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_set** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5634">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5634">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5635">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5635">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5636">**interface_index** Índice para a interface o endereço IPv6 está associado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5636">**interface_index** Index to the interface the IPv6 address is associated with</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5637">**ip_address** Ponteiro para o endereço a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5637">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5638">**prefix_length** Comprimento do prefixo do endereço (máscara de sub-rede)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5638">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5639">**address_index** Ponteiro para o índice na tabela de endereços onde o endereço é inserido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5639">**address_index** Pointer to the index into the address table where the address is inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5640">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) tabela de endereços IP está cheia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) O endereço IP fornecido já é utilizado neste caso IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv6 inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface aponta para uma interface de rede inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface points to an invalid network interface</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5649">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5650">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5650">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5651">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5652">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5653">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5679">Adicione um router IPv6 à tabela de router predefinido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5680">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5681">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5682">Este serviço adiciona um router padrão IPv6 na interface física especificada à tabela de router predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5683">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5684">*router_address* deve apontar para um endereço IPv6 válido, e o router deve estar diretamente acessível a partir da interface física especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5685">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5686">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5687">**router_address** Ponteiro para o endereço do router predefinido, na ordem byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5688">**router_lifetime** Tempo de vida do router padrão, em segundos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5689">Os valores válidos são:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5690">**0xFFFF:** Não há tempo para sair.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Valor de tempo limite, em segundos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5692">**index_index** Ponteiro para a localização de memória válida para o índice de rede através do qual o router pode ser alcançado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5693">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5694">**router padrão NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) é adicionado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não há mais entradas disponíveis na tabela de router predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv6 inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Entrada de endereço IPv6 não válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5704">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5706">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5720">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5720">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5721">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5721">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5722">Este serviço elimina um router padrão IPv6 da tabela de router predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5722">This service deletes an IPv6 default router from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5723">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5723">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5730">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5730">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5741">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5762">Obtenha entrada de router predefinido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5764">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5765">Este serviço recupera uma entrada de router a partir da tabela de encaminhamento padrão IPv6 que está ligada a um dispositivo de rede especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5766">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5767">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5768">**interface_index** Índice da interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5769">**entry_index** Índice de Entrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5770">**router_addr** Endereço IPv6 do Router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5771">**router_lifetime** Ponteiro para o tempo de vida do router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5772">**prefix_length** Ponteiro para o comprimento do prefixo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5773">**configuration_method** Ponteiro para a informação sobre como a entrada foi configurada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5774">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Com sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) entrada do Router não encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5780">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5781">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5782">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5783">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5783">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5784">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5797">Recupere um Router IPv6 da tabela de router predefinido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5798">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5799">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5800">Este serviço recupera um endereço de router padrão IPv6, duração útil e prefixo na interface física especificada a partir da tabela de router predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5801">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5802">*router_address* deve apontar para uma estrutura de NXD_ADDRESS válida, para que este serviço possa preencher o endereço IPv6 do router predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5803">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5804">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5805">**interface_index** O índice para a interface de rede que o router é acessível através</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5806">**router_address** Ponteiro para o espaço de armazenamento para o valor de retorno do endereço de router predefinido, na ordem byte de anfitrião.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5807">**router_lifetime** Ponteiro para a vida útil do router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5808">**prefix_length** Ponteiro para o comprimento do prefixo do endereço do router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5809">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5810">**router padrão NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) é adicionado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5812">**router padrão NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) não encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Default router not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de interface de router inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5816">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5817">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5817">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5818">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5818">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5819">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5819">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5820">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5833">Obtenha o número de routers IPv6 predefinidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5833">Get number of default IPv6 routers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5834">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5834">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT *num_entries);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5835">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5836">Este serviço recupera o número de routers padrão IPv6 configurados numa determinada interface de rede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5836">This service retrieves the number of IPv6 default routers configured on a given network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5837">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5838">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5838">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5839">**interface_index** Índice da interface de rede</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5839">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5840">**num_entries** Destino para o número de routers IPv6 num dispositivo de rede especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5840">**num_entries** Destination for number of IPv6 routers on a specified network device</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5841">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5841">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Com sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5844">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O valor do índice do dispositivo não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5844">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index value is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido ou ponteiro num_entries</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or num_entries pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5849">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5849">No</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UINT                   num_entries;

/* Get the router entries of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                                       &num_entries);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entries was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5863">Desative a função IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5865">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5866">Este serviço desativa o IPv6 para a instância IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5867">Também limpa a tabela de routers predefinidos, cache ND e tabela de endereços IPv6, deixa todos os grupos multicast e repõe as variáveis de solicitação do router.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5868">Este serviço não tem efeito se o IPv6 não estiver ativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5869">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5870">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5871">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desativação bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) módulo IPv6 não é compilado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5877">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5878">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5879">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5880">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5881">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5907">Ativar serviços IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5908">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5909">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5910">Este serviço permite serviços IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5911">Quando os serviços IPv6 estão ativados, a instância IP junta-se ao grupo multicast all-node (FF02::1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5912">Este serviço não define o endereço local de ligação ou endereço global.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5913">As aplicações devem utilizar *nxd_ipv6_address_set* para configurar os endereços de rede do dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5914">Não há equivalente NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5915">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5916">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5917">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 já está ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5923">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5924">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5925">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5926">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5927">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5953">Junte-se a um grupo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5954">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5955">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5956">Este serviço permite que uma aplicação se junte a um endereço multicast IPv6 específico numa interface de rede específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5957">O controlador de ligação é notificado para adicionar o endereço multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5958">Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5959">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5960">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5961">**group_address** Endereço multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5962">**interface_index** O índice da interface de rede associada ao grupo multicast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5963">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) permite receber com sucesso o endereço multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Não há mais inscrições na tabela multicast IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Não há mais endereços de grupo disponíveis no controlador do dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 ou recurso multicast IPv6 não é incorporado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv6 inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5972">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5973">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5973">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5974">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5974">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5975">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5976">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5989">Deixe um grupo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5991">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5992">Este serviço remove o endereço multicast IPv6 específico do dispositivo de rede específico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5993">O controlador de ligação também é notificado da remoção do endereço multicast IPv6. Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5994">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5995">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-5996">**group_address** Endereço multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
