## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6024">Desativar o endereço apátrida automaticamente configurar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6026">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6027">Este serviço desativa a função de configuração automática de endereço apátrida IPv6 num dispositivo de rede especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6028">Não tem efeito se o endereço IPv6 tiver sido configurado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6029">Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6030">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6031">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6032">**interface_index** O índice da interface de rede que o endereço apátrida IPv6 deve ser desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6033">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) desativa com sucesso a função de configuração automática de endereços apátridas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 ou função de controlo autoconfig de endereço apátrida IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6039">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6040">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6041">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6042">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6043">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6069">Permitir a autoconfigução de endereço apátrida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6071">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6072">Este serviço permite a funcionalidade de configuração automática de endereço apátrida IPv6 num dispositivo de rede especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6073">Este serviço está disponível se a biblioteca NetX Duo for construída com a opção ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6074">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6075">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro de instância IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6076">**interface_index** O índice da interface de rede que o endereço apátrida IPv6 deve ser ativado automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6077">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Permite com sucesso a função de configuração automática de endereços apátridas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Já ativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funcionalidade IPv6 ou função de controlo autoconfig de endereço apátrida IPv6 não está incorporada na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) O índice de interface não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro do bloco de controlo IP inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6084">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6087">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6088">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this

```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6114">Excluir entrada de endereço IPv6 na Cache do Vizinho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6116">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6117">Este serviço elimina uma entrada de cache de descoberta de vizinho iPv6 para o endereço IP fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6118">A função LíquidaX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6119">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6120">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6121">**ip_address** Endereço do Ponteiro para iPv6 para apagar, na ordem byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6122">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) apagou com sucesso o endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Endereço não encontrado na cache do vizinho IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está integrado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6128">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6129">Inicialização, fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6130">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6131">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6132">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6150">Adicione um endereço IPv6/MAC Mapping à Cache do Vizinho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6151">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6152">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6153">Este serviço adiciona uma entrada na cache de descoberta do vizinho para o endereço IP especificado *ip_address* mapeado para o endereço MAC de hardware no índice de interface de rede especificado (interface_index).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6154">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6155">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6156">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6157">**dest_ip** Indicação para o endereço IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6158">**interface_index** Índice especificando interface de rede física onde o endereço IPv6 de destino pode ser alcançado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6159">**mac** Ponteiro para o endereço de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6160">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada adicionada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Cache inválido ou nenhuma entrada de cache do vizinho disponível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está integrado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Valor do índice de interface inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6167">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6168">Inicialização, Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6169">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6170">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6171">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6191">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6192">Este serviço tenta encontrar um endereço de hardware físico na cache de descoberta do vizinho IPv6 que está associado com o endereço IPv6 fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6193">O índice da interface de rede através do qual o vizinho pode ser alcançado também é devolvido no parâmetro *interface_index.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6194">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6195">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6196">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6197">**ip_address** Ponteiro para endereço IP para encontrar, encomenda byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6198">**physical_msw** Ponteiro para os 16 melhores bits (47-32) do endereço físico, em ordem byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6199">**physical_lsw** Ponteiro para os 32 bits inferiores (31-0) do endereço físico em ordem byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6200">**interface_index** Ponteiro para a localização de memória válida para o índice de interface especificando o dispositivo de rede no qual o endereço IPv6 pode ser alcançado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6201">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) encontrou com sucesso o endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapeamento não na cache do vizinho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está integrado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) O endereço IP fornecido não é a versão 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6208">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6209">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6210">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6211">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6212">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6265">Obter endereço IPv6 para um endereço físico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6267">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6268">Este serviço tenta encontrar um endereço IPv6 na cache de descoberta do vizinho IPv6 que está associado com o endereço físico fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6269">O índice da interface de rede através do qual o vizinho pode ser alcançado também é devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6270">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6271">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6272">**ip_ptr** Ponteiro para instância IP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6273">**ip_address** Ponteiro para estrutura NXD_ADDRESS válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) do endereço físico para encontrar, ordem byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6275">**physical_lsw** Inferior 32 bits (31-0) do endereço físico para encontrar, ordem byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6276">**interface_index** Ponteiro para o índice do dispositivo de rede através do qual o endereço IPv6 pode ser alcançado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6277">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) encontrou com sucesso o endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Endereço físico não encontrado na cache do vizinho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 não está integrado na biblioteca NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Instância IP inválida ou espaço de armazenamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** endereço MAC (0x4D) é zero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6284">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6286">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6288">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6306">Faça uma ligação TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6307">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6308">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6309">Este serviço faz a ligação TCP utilizando uma tomada de cliente TCP previamente criada para a porta do servidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6310">Este serviço funciona em redes IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6311">As portas de servidores TCP válidas variam de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6312">O NetX Duo determina a interface física adequada com base no endereço IP do servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6313">O equivalente NetX IPv4 é ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6314">A tomada deve ter sido ligada a um porto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6315">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6316">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada TCP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6317">**server_ip** Ponteiro para endereço de destino IPv4 ou IPv6, em encomenda byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6318">**server_port** Número da porta do servidor para ligar a (1 a 0xFFFF), em ordem byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6319">**wait_option** Opção de espera enquanto a ligação está a ser estabelecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6320">As opções de espera são definidas da seguinte forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6323">**valor de tempo limite em carrapatos** (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6324">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ligação de tomada bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) A suspensão solicitada foi abortada por uma chamada para tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 do servidor inválido ou inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não está ligada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Tomada não está em estado fechado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Não foi especificada qualquer espera, tentativa de ligação está em curso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Índice de interface inválido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) A interface de rede não tem endereço IPv6 válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6333">**TCP NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) não está habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6334">**porta** inválida NX_INVALID_PORT (0x46)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6335">**ponteiro de tomada** inválida NX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) A ligação falha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6338">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6341">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6342">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6367">Recupera endereço IP da tomada peer TCP e número de porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6369">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6370">Este serviço recupera o endereço IP e informações de porta para a tomada TCP conectada sobre a rede IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6371">O serviço NetX IPv4 equivalente é ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6372">Note que *socket_ptr* deve apontar para uma tomada TCP que já se encontra no estado ligado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6373">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6374">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para tomada TCP ligado ao hospedeiro de pares</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6375">**peer_ip_address** Ponteiro para endereço de pares IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6376">O endereço IP devolvido está na ordem de anfitrião byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6377">**peer_port** Ponteiro para o número da porta de pares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6378">O número de porta devolvido está em ordem de adeus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6379">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Informações de tomadas recuperadas com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Tomada não ligada ao par</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6382">**TCP NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) não está habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Entrada inválida do ponteiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6385">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6386">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6387">Preempção Possível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6388">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6389">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6414">Extrair parâmetros de rede do pacote UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6415">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6416">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6417">Este serviço extrai parâmetros de rede de um pacote recebido nas redes IPv4 ou IPv6 UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6418">O serviço equivalente NetX é ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6419">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6420">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6421">**ip_address** Ponteiro para o endereço IP remetente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6422">**protocolo** Ponteiro para o protocolo a ser devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6423">**porto** Ponteiro para o número da porta do remetente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6424">**interface_index** Ponteiro para o índice da interface de rede a partir do qual este pacote é recebido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6425">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dados de interface de pacote extraídos com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Pacote não é nem IPv4 nem IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6458">Enviar um UDP Datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6460">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6461">Este serviço envia um datagrama de UDP através de uma tomada UDP previamente criada e ligada para redes IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6462">NetX Duo encontra um endereço IP local adequado como endereço de origem baseado no endereço IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6463">Para especificar uma interface específica e endereço IP de origem, a aplicação deve utilizar o serviço ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6464">Note que este serviço retorna imediatamente independentemente de o datagrama da UDP ter sido enviado com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6465">O serviço equivalente NetX (IPv4) é ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6466">A tomada deve estar ligada a um porto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6467">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6468">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6469">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote de datagrama da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6470">**ip_address** Endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6471">**porto** Número de porta de destino válido entre 1 e 0xFFFF), em encomenda byte de anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6472">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Envio de tomada uDP bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 do servidor inválido ou inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não ligada a nenhuma porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para cabeçalho UDP no pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida, ponteiro de endereço ou ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP não foi habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Número de porta não está dentro de um alcance válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6483">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6484">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6484">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6486">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6486">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6487">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6511">Enviar um UDP Datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6513">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6514">Este serviço envia um datagrama de UDP através de uma tomada UDP previamente criada e ligada para redes IPv4 ou IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6515">O parâmetro *address_index* especifica o endereço IP de origem a utilizar para o pacote de saída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6516">Note que a função retorna imediatamente independentemente de o datagrama da UDP ter sido enviado com sucesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6517">A tomada deve estar ligada a um porto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6518">O serviço equivalente NetX (IPv4) é ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6519">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6520">**socket_ptr** Ponteiro para a instância de tomada UDP previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6521">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro do pacote de datagrama da UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6522">**ip_address** Ponteiro para destino IPv4 ou IPv6 endereço porto de destino número de porta de destino válido entre 1 e 0xFFFF), em encomenda byte anfitrião</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6523">**address_index** Índice especificando o endereço de origem para usar para o pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6524">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Envio de tomada uDP bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Endereço IPv4 ou IPv6 do servidor inválido ou inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Tomada não ligada a nenhuma porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Não é possível encontrar uma interface de saída adequada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Não é possível encontrar uma interface adequada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) No suitable interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tomada inválida, endereço ou ponteiro do pacote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP não foi habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) O número da porta não está ao alcance válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface de rede especificada é válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Não há espaço suficiente para cabeçalho UDP no pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) O ponteiro do apêndice do pacote é inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6540">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6540">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6541">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6565">Recuperar informações de origem de pacotes UPD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6566">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6567">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6568">Este serviço extrai o endereço IP de origem e o número de porta de um pacote UDP recebido através da tomada UDP hospedeira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6569">O equivalente NetX (IPv4) é ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6570">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6571">**packet_ptr** Ponteiro para receber pacote UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6572">**ip_address** Ponteiro para NXD_ADDRESS estrutura para armazenar endereço IP de origem de pacote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6573">**porto** Número da porta da tomada UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6574">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Extrato de origem bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Pacote não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6577">**ponteiro de tomada** inválida NX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido deste serviço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8bb19-6583">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8bb19-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
